2757 c -= BM_BORDER_TEST(block, bm::rs3_border0_1);
2758 }
2759 }
2760 }
2761 }
2762 break;
2763 case 2:
2764 {
2765 // |--------[0]-----------[1]-x---*----|
2766 if (nbit_right <= rs3_border1_1)
2767 {
2768 unsigned d1 = nbit_right - bm::rs3_border1;
2769 unsigned d2 = (rs3_border1_1 + cutoff_bias) - nbit_right;
2770 if (d1 < d2) // |--------[0]-----------[1]-x---*----|
2771 {
2772 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range<true, false>(block,
2773 bm::rs3_border1,
2774 nbit_right);
2775 c += first + second; //bc_second_range;
2776 c -= BM_BORDER_TEST(block, bm::rs3_border1);
2777 }
2778 else // |--------[0]-----------[1]---x-*----|
2779 {
2780 if (nbit_right == rs3_border1_1)
2781 {
2782 unsigned aux1 = bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48);
2783 c = aux1;
2784 }
2785 else
2786 {
2787 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block,
2788 nbit_right+1,
2789 rs3_border1_1);
2790 unsigned aux1 = bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48);
2791 c = aux1 - c;
2792 }
2793 }
2794 }
2795 else
2796 {
2797 // |--------[0]-----------[1]----------x
2798 if (nbit_right == bm::gap_max_bits-1)
2799 {
2800 c = rs_idx.count(nb);
2801 }
2802 else // sub-range processing
2803 {
2804 // |--------[0]-----------[1]-------x--|
2805 BM_ASSERT(nbit_right > bm::rs3_border1_1);
2806 unsigned d1 = nbit_right - bm::rs3_border1_1;
2807 unsigned d2 = bm::gap_max_bits - nbit_right;
2808 if (d2 < d1)
2809 {
2810 // |--------[0]----------[1]----*---x-|
2811 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block,
2812 nbit_right+1,
2813 bm::gap_max_bits-1);
2814 size_type cnt = rs_idx.count(nb);
2815 c = cnt - c;
2816 }
2817 else
2818 {
2819 // |--------[0]----------[1]----*-x---|
2820 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range<true, false>(block,
2821 bm::rs3_border1_1,
2822 nbit_right);
2823 unsigned aux1 = bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48);
2824 c += aux1;
2825 c -= BM_BORDER_TEST(block, bm::rs3_border1_1);
2826 }
2827 }
2828 }
2829 }
2830 break;
2831 default:
2832 BM_ASSERT(0);
2833 c = 0;
2834 } // switch
2835
2836 BM_ASSERT(c == bm::bit_block_calc_count_to(block, nbit_right));
2837 return c;
2838}
2839
2840#else // non-SIMD version
2841
2842template<typename Alloc>
2843typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
2844bvector<Alloc>::block_count_to(const bm::word_t* block,
2845 block_idx_type nb,
2846 unsigned nbit_right,
2847 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) BMNOEXCEPT
2848{
2849 BM_ASSERT(block);
2850
2851 bm::id64_t sub = rs_idx.sub_count(nb);
2852 unsigned sub_cnt = unsigned(sub);
2853 unsigned first = sub_cnt & 0xFFFF;
2854 unsigned second = sub_cnt >> 16;
2855
2856 BM_ASSERT(first == bm::bit_block_calc_count_to(block, rs3_border0));
2857 BM_ASSERT(second == bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block, rs3_border0+1, rs3_border1));
2858
2859
2860 {
2861 unsigned cnt, aux0(bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 32)); (void)cnt; (void)aux0;
2862 BM_ASSERT(aux0 == (cnt =bm::bit_block_calc_count_to(block, bm::rs3_border0_1)));
2863 unsigned cnt1, aux1(bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48)); (void)aux1; (void) cnt1;
2864 BM_ASSERT(aux1 == (cnt1 =bm::bit_block_calc_count_to(block, bm::rs3_border1_1)));
2865 }
2866
2867 size_type c=0;
2868 unsigned sub_choice =
2869 bm::get_nibble(bm::rs_intervals<true>::_c._lut, nbit_right);
2870
2871 switch(sub_choice)
2872 {
2873 case 0:
2874 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range<true, false>(block, 0, nbit_right);
2875 break;
2876 case 1:
2877 c = first;
2878 break;
2879 case 2:
2880 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block, nbit_right+1, rs3_border0);
2881 c = first - c;
2882 break;
2883 case 3:
2884 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range<true, false>(block,
2885 bm::rs3_border0,
2886 nbit_right);
2887 c += first - BM_BORDER_TEST(block, bm::rs3_border0);
2888 break;
2889 case 4:
2890 c = first + second;
2891 break;
2892 case 5:
2893 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block, nbit_right+1, rs3_border1);
2894 c = first + second - c;
2895 break;
2896 case 6:
2897 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range<true, false>(
2898 block,
2899 bm::rs3_border0_1,
2900 nbit_right);
2901 c += bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 32); // aux0
2902 c -= BM_BORDER_TEST(block, bm::rs3_border0_1);
2903 break;
2904 case 7:
2905 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range<true, false>(block,
2906 bm::rs3_border1,
2907 nbit_right);
2908 c += first + second; //bc_second_range;
2909 c -= BM_BORDER_TEST(block, bm::rs3_border1);
2910 break;
2911 case 8:
2912 c = bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48); // aux1;
2913 break;
2914 case 9:
2915 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block,
2916 nbit_right+1,
2917 rs3_border1_1);
2918 c = bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48) - c; // aux1 - c
2919 break;
2920 case 10:
2921 c = rs_idx.count(nb);
2922 break;
2923 case 11:
2924 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block,
2925 nbit_right+1,
2926 bm::gap_max_bits-1);
2927 c = rs_idx.count(nb) - c;
2928 break;
2929 case 12:
2930 c = bm::bit_block_calc_count_range<true, false>(block,
2931 bm::rs3_border1_1,
2932 nbit_right);
2933 c += bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48); // aux1;
2934 c -= BM_BORDER_TEST(block, bm::rs3_border1_1);
2935 break;
2936 default:
2937 BM_ASSERT(0);
2938 } // switch
2939 BM_ASSERT(c == bm::bit_block_calc_count_to(block, nbit_right));
2940 return c;
2941}
2942#endif
2943
2944#undef BM_BORDER_TEST
2945
2946// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
2947
2948template<typename Alloc>
2949typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
2950bvector<Alloc>::gap_count_to(const bm::gap_word_t* gap_block,
2951 block_idx_type nb,
2952 unsigned nbit_right,
2953 const rs_index_type& rs_idx,
2954 bool test_set) BMNOEXCEPT
2955{
2956 BM_ASSERT(gap_block);
2957 size_type c;
2958
2959
2960 if (test_set)
2961 {
2962 bool is_set = bm::gap_test_unr(gap_block, (gap_word_t)nbit_right);
2963 if (!is_set)
2964 return 0;
2965 }
2966/*
2967 {
2968 unsigned len = bm::gap_length(gap_block);
2969 if (len < 64)
2970 {
2971 c = bm::gap_bit_count_to(gap_block, (gap_word_t)nbit_right);
2972 return c;
2973 }
2974 }
2975*/
2976 bm::id64_t sub = rs_idx.sub_count(nb);
2977 unsigned sub_cnt = unsigned(sub);
2978 unsigned first = bm::gap_word_t(sub_cnt);
2979 unsigned second = (sub_cnt >> 16);
2980
2981
2982 BM_ASSERT(first == bm::gap_bit_count_to(gap_block,(gap_word_t)rs3_border0));
2983 BM_ASSERT(second == bm::gap_bit_count_range(gap_block, rs3_border0+1, rs3_border1));
2984
2985 // evaluate 3 sub-block intervals
2986 // |--------[0]-----------[1]----------|
2987 const unsigned cutoff_bias = rs3_half_span/8;
2988 unsigned sub_range = rs_idx.find_sub_range(nbit_right);
2989 switch(sub_range) // sub-range rank calc
2990 {
2991 case 0:
2992 // |--x-----[0]-----------[1]----------|
2993 if (nbit_right <= (rs3_border0/2 + cutoff_bias))
2994 {
2995 c = bm::gap_bit_count_to(gap_block,(gap_word_t)nbit_right);
2996 }
2997 else
2998 {
2999 // |--------[x]-----------[1]----------|
3000 if (nbit_right == rs3_border0)
3001 {
3002 c = first;
3003 }
3004 else
3005 {
3006 // |------x-[0]-----------[1]----------|
3007 c =
3008 bm::gap_bit_count_range(gap_block, nbit_right+1, rs3_border0);
3009 c = first - c;
3010 }
3011 }
3012 break;
3013 case 1:
3014 // |--------[0]-x---------[1]----------|
3015 if (nbit_right <= (rs3_border0 + rs3_half_span + cutoff_bias))
3016 {
3017 unsigned aux0 = bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 32);
3018 c = bm::gap_bit_count_range_hint(gap_block,
3019 rs3_border0+1, nbit_right, aux0);
3020 c += first;
3021 }
3022 else
3023 {
3024 // |--------[0]-----------[x]----------|
3025 if (nbit_right == rs3_border1)
3026 {
3027 c = first + second;
3028 }
3029 else
3030 {
3031 // |--------[0]--------x--[1]----------|
3032 c =
3033 bm::gap_bit_count_range(gap_block, nbit_right+1, rs3_border1);
3034 c = first + second - c;
3035 }
3036 }
3037 break;
3038 case 2:
3039 {
3040 // |--------[0]-----------[1]-x--------|
3041 if (nbit_right <= (rs3_border1 + rs3_half_span + cutoff_bias))
3042 {
3043 unsigned aux1 = bm::gap_word_t(sub >> 48);
3044 c = bm::gap_bit_count_range_hint(gap_block,
3045 rs3_border1 + 1, nbit_right, aux1);
3046 c += first + second; // += bc_second_range
3047 }
3048 else
3049 {
3050 // |--------[0]-----------[1]----------x
3051 if (nbit_right == bm::gap_max_bits-1)
3052 {
3053 c = rs_idx.count(nb);
3054 }
3055 else
3056 {
3057 // |--------[0]-----------[1]-------x--|
3058 c = bm::gap_bit_count_range<bm::gap_word_t, true> (gap_block,
3059 nbit_right+1, bm::gap_max_bits-1);
3060 size_type cnt = rs_idx.count(nb);
3061 c = cnt - c;
3062 }
3063 }
3064 }
3065 break;
3066 default:
3067 BM_ASSERT(0);
3068 c = 0;
3069 } // switch
3070
3071 BM_ASSERT(c == bm::gap_bit_count_to(gap_block, (gap_word_t)nbit_right));
3072 return c;
3073}
3074
3075// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3076
3077template<typename Alloc>
3078typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
3079bvector<Alloc>::count_to(size_type right,
3080 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) const BMNOEXCEPT
3081{
3082 BM_ASSERT(right < bm::id_max);
3083 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3084 return 0;
3085
3086 unsigned nb_right = unsigned(right >> bm::set_block_shift);
3087
3088 // running count of all blocks before target
3089 //
3090 size_type cnt;
3091 if (nb_right >= rs_idx.get_total())
3092 {
3093 cnt = rs_idx.count();
3094 return cnt;
3095 }
3096 cnt = nb_right ? rs_idx.rcount(nb_right-1) : 0;
3097
3098 unsigned i, j;
3099 bm::get_block_coord(nb_right, i, j);
3100 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
3101
3102 if (block)
3103 {
3104 size_type c;
3105 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3106 if (BM_IS_GAP(block))
3107 {
3108 const bm::gap_word_t* gap_block = BMGAP_PTR(block);
3109 c = this->gap_count_to(gap_block, nb_right, nbit_right, rs_idx);
3110 }
3111 else
3112 {
3113 if (block == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) // TODO: misses REAL full sometimes
3114 {
3115 return cnt + nbit_right + 1;
3116 }
3117 else // real bit-block
3118 {
3119 c = this->block_count_to(block, nb_right, nbit_right, rs_idx);
3120 }
3121 }
3122 cnt += c;
3123
3124 }
3125 return cnt;
3126}
3127
3128// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3129
3130template<typename Alloc>
3131typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
3132bvector<Alloc>::count_to_test(size_type right,
3133 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) const BMNOEXCEPT
3134{
3135 BM_ASSERT(right < bm::id_max);
3136 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3137 return 0;
3138
3139 unsigned nb_right = unsigned(right >> bm::set_block_shift);
3140
3141 unsigned i, j;
3142 bm::get_block_coord(nb_right, i, j);
3143 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
3144 if (!block)
3145 return 0;
3146
3147 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3148 size_type cnt = nbit_right + 1; // default for FULL BLOCK
3149 if (BM_IS_GAP(block))
3150 {
3151 bm::gap_word_t *gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(block);
3152 cnt = gap_count_to(gap_blk, nb_right, nbit_right, rs_idx, true);
3153 if (!cnt)
3154 return cnt;
3155 BM_ASSERT(cnt == bm::gap_bit_count_to(gap_blk, (gap_word_t)nbit_right));
3156 /*
3157 if (bm::gap_test_unr(gap_blk, (gap_word_t)nbit_right))
3158 {
3159 cnt = gap_count_to(gap_blk, nb_right, nbit_right, rs_idx);
3160 BM_ASSERT(cnt == bm::gap_bit_count_to(gap_blk, (gap_word_t)nbit_right));
3161 }
3162 else
3163 return 0;
3164 */
3165 }
3166 else
3167 {
3168 if (block != FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3169 {
3170 unsigned w = block[nbit_right >> bm::set_word_shift]; // nword
3171 if (w &= (1u << (nbit_right & bm::set_word_mask)))
3172 {
3173 cnt = block_count_to(block, nb_right, nbit_right, rs_idx);
3174 BM_ASSERT(cnt == bm::bit_block_calc_count_to(block, nbit_right));
3175 }
3176 else
3177 return 0;
3178 }
3179 }
3180 cnt += nb_right ? rs_idx.rcount(nb_right - 1) : 0;
3181 return cnt;
3182}
3183
3184// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3185
3186template<typename Alloc>
3187typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
3188bvector<Alloc>::rank_corrected(size_type right,
3189 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) const BMNOEXCEPT
3190{
3191 BM_ASSERT(right < bm::id_max);
3192 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3193 return 0;
3194
3195 unsigned nblock_right = unsigned(right >> bm::set_block_shift);
3196 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3197
3198 size_type cnt = nblock_right ? rs_idx.rcount(nblock_right - 1) : 0;
3199
3200 unsigned i, j;
3201 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i, j);
3202 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
3203
3204 if (!block)
3205 return cnt;
3206
3207 bool gap = BM_IS_GAP(block);
3208 if (gap)
3209 {
3210 cnt += bm::gap_bit_count_to<bm::gap_word_t, true>(
3211 BMGAP_PTR(block), (gap_word_t)nbit_right);
3212 }
3213 else
3214 {
3215 if (block == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3216 cnt += nbit_right;
3217 else
3218 {
3219 cnt += block_count_to(block, nblock_right, nbit_right, rs_idx);
3220 unsigned w = block[nbit_right >> bm::set_word_shift] &
3221 (1u << (nbit_right & bm::set_word_mask));
3222 cnt -= bool(w); // rank correction
3223 }
3224 }
3225 return cnt;
3226}
3227
3228
3229// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3230
3231template<typename Alloc>
3232typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
3233bvector<Alloc>::count_range(size_type left, size_type right) const BMNOEXCEPT
3234{
3235 BM_ASSERT(left < bm::id_max && right < bm::id_max);
3236 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3237 return 0;
3238 if (left > right)
3239 bm::xor_swap(left, right);
3240 if (right == bm::id_max)
3241 --right;
3242 return count_range_no_check(left, right);
3243}
3244
3245// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3246
3247template<typename Alloc>
3248typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
3249bvector<Alloc>::count_range_no_check(size_type left, size_type right) const BMNOEXCEPT
3250{
3251 size_type cnt = 0;
3252
3253 // calculate logical number of start and destination blocks
3254 block_idx_type nblock_left = (left >> bm::set_block_shift);
3255 block_idx_type nblock_right = (right >> bm::set_block_shift);
3256
3257 unsigned i0, j0;
3258 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i0, j0);
3259 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block(i0, j0);
3260
3261 bool left_gap = BM_IS_GAP(block);
3262
3263 unsigned nbit_left = unsigned(left & bm::set_block_mask);
3264 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3265
3266 unsigned r =
3267 (nblock_left == nblock_right) ? nbit_right : (bm::bits_in_block-1);
3268
3269 typename blocks_manager_type::block_count_func func(blockman_);
3270
3271 if (block)
3272 {
3273 if ((nbit_left == 0) && (r == (bm::bits_in_block-1))) // whole block
3274 {
3275 func(block);
3276 cnt += func.count();
3277 }
3278 else
3279 {
3280 if (left_gap)
3281 {
3282 cnt += bm::gap_bit_count_range(BMGAP_PTR(block),
3283 (gap_word_t)nbit_left,
3284 (gap_word_t)r);
3285 }
3286 else
3287 {
3288 cnt += bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block, nbit_left, r);
3289 }
3290 }
3291 }
3292
3293 if (nblock_left == nblock_right) // in one block
3294 return cnt;
3295
3296 // process all full mid-blocks
3297 {
3298 func.reset();
3299 word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3300 block_idx_type top_blocks_size = blockman_.top_block_size();
3301
3302 bm::for_each_nzblock_range(blk_root, top_blocks_size,
3303 nblock_left+1, nblock_right-1, func);
3304 cnt += func.count();
3305 }
3306
3307 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i0, j0);
3308 block = blockman_.get_block(i0, j0);
3309 bool right_gap = BM_IS_GAP(block);
3310
3311 if (block)
3312 {
3313 if (right_gap)
3314 {
3315 cnt +=
3316 bm::gap_bit_count_to(BMGAP_PTR(block), (gap_word_t)nbit_right);
3317 }
3318 else
3319 {
3320 cnt += bm::bit_block_calc_count_range(block, 0, nbit_right);
3321 }
3322 }
3323 return cnt;
3324}
3325
3326// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3327
3328template<typename Alloc>
3329bool bvector<Alloc>::is_all_one_range(size_type left,
3330 size_type right) const BMNOEXCEPT
3331{
3332 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3333 return false; // nothing to do
3334
3335 if (right < left)
3336 bm::xor_swap(left, right);
3337 if (right == bm::id_max)
3338 --right;
3339 if (left == right)
3340 return test(left);
3341
3342 BM_ASSERT(left < bm::id_max && right < bm::id_max);
3343
3344 block_idx_type nblock_left = (left >> bm::set_block_shift);
3345 block_idx_type nblock_right = (right >> bm::set_block_shift);
3346
3347 unsigned i0, j0;
3348 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i0, j0);
3349 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block(i0, j0);
3350
3351 if (nblock_left == nblock_right) // hit in the same block
3352 {
3353 unsigned nbit_left = unsigned(left & bm::set_block_mask);
3354 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3355 return bm::block_is_all_one_range(block, nbit_left, nbit_right);
3356 }
3357
3358 // process entry point block
3359 {
3360 unsigned nbit_left = unsigned(left & bm::set_block_mask);
3361 bool all_one = bm::block_is_all_one_range(block,
3362 nbit_left, (bm::gap_max_bits-1));
3363 if (!all_one)
3364 return all_one;
3365 ++nblock_left;
3366 }
3367
3368 // process tail block
3369 {
3370 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i0, j0);
3371 block = blockman_.get_block(i0, j0);
3372 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3373 bool all_one = bm::block_is_all_one_range(block, 0, nbit_right);
3374 if (!all_one)
3375 return all_one;
3376 --nblock_right;
3377 }
3378
3379 // check all blocks in the middle
3380 //
3381 if (nblock_left <= nblock_right)
3382 {
3383 unsigned i_from, j_from, i_to, j_to;
3384 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i_from, j_from);
3385 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i_to, j_to);
3386
3387 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3388
3389 for (unsigned i = i_from; i <= i_to; ++i)
3390 {
3391 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
3392 if (!blk_blk)
3393 return false;
3394 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3395 continue;
3396
3397 unsigned j = (i == i_from) ? j_from : 0;
3398 unsigned j_limit = (i == i_to) ? j_to+1 : bm::set_sub_array_size;
3399 do
3400 {
3401 bool all_one = bm::check_block_one(blk_blk[j], true);
3402 if (!all_one)
3403 return all_one;
3404 } while (++j < j_limit);
3405 } // for i
3406 }
3407 return true;
3408}
3409
3410// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3411
3412template<typename Alloc>
3413bool bvector<Alloc>::any_range(size_type left, size_type right) const BMNOEXCEPT
3414{
3415 BM_ASSERT(left < bm::id_max && right < bm::id_max);
3416
3417 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3418 return false; // nothing to do
3419
3420 if (right < left)
3421 bm::xor_swap(left, right);
3422 if (right == bm::id_max)
3423 --right;
3424 if (left == right)
3425 return test(left);
3426
3427 block_idx_type nblock_left = (left >> bm::set_block_shift);
3428 block_idx_type nblock_right = (right >> bm::set_block_shift);
3429
3430 unsigned i0, j0;
3431 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i0, j0);
3432 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block(i0, j0);
3433
3434 if (nblock_left == nblock_right) // hit in the same block
3435 {
3436 unsigned nbit_left = unsigned(left & bm::set_block_mask);
3437 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3438 return bm::block_any_range(block, nbit_left, nbit_right);
3439 }
3440
3441 // process entry point block
3442 {
3443 unsigned nbit_left = unsigned(left & bm::set_block_mask);
3444 bool any_one = bm::block_any_range(block,
3445 nbit_left, (bm::gap_max_bits-1));
3446 if (any_one)
3447 return any_one;
3448 ++nblock_left;
3449 }
3450
3451 // process tail block
3452 {
3453 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i0, j0);
3454 block = blockman_.get_block(i0, j0);
3455 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
3456 bool any_one = bm::block_any_range(block, 0, nbit_right);
3457 if (any_one)
3458 return any_one;
3459 --nblock_right;
3460 }
3461
3462 // check all blocks in the middle
3463 //
3464 if (nblock_left <= nblock_right)
3465 {
3466 unsigned i_from, j_from, i_to, j_to;
3467 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i_from, j_from);
3468 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i_to, j_to);
3469
3470 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3471 {
3472 block_idx_type top_size = blockman_.top_block_size();
3473 if (i_from >= top_size)
3474 return false;
3475 if (i_to >= top_size)
3476 {
3477 i_to = unsigned(top_size-1);
3478 j_to = bm::set_sub_array_size-1;
3479 }
3480 }
3481
3482 for (unsigned i = i_from; i <= i_to; ++i)
3483 {
3484 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
3485 if (!blk_blk)
3486 continue;
3487 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3488 return true;
3489
3490 unsigned j = (i == i_from) ? j_from : 0;
3491 unsigned j_limit = (i == i_to) ? j_to+1 : bm::set_sub_array_size;
3492 do
3493 {
3494 bool any_one = bm::block_any(blk_blk[j]);
3495 if (any_one)
3496 return any_one;
3497 } while (++j < j_limit);
3498 } // for i
3499 }
3500 return false;
3501}
3502
3503// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3504
3505template<typename Alloc>
3506typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
3507bvector<Alloc>::count_range(size_type left,
3508 size_type right,
3509 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) const BMNOEXCEPT
3510{
3511 if (left > right)
3512 bm::xor_swap(left, right);
3513 BM_ASSERT_THROW(right < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
3514 return count_range_no_check(left, right, rs_idx);
3515}
3516
3517// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3518
3519template<typename Alloc>
3520typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
3521bvector<Alloc>::count_range_no_check(size_type left,
3522 size_type right,
3523 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) const BMNOEXCEPT
3524{
3525 BM_ASSERT(left <= right);
3526 if (left == right)
3527 return this->test(left);
3528 size_type cnt_l, cnt_r;
3529 if (left)
3530 cnt_l = this->count_to(left-1, rs_idx);
3531 else
3532 cnt_l = left; // == 0
3533 cnt_r = this->count_to(right, rs_idx);
3534 return cnt_r - cnt_l;
3535}
3536
3537// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3538
3539template<typename Alloc>
3540bvector<Alloc>& bvector<Alloc>::invert()
3541{
3542 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
3543
3544 if (!size_)
3545 return *this; // cannot invert a set of power 0
3546
3547 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(bm::set_top_array_size);
3548 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3549 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
3550 {
3551 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
3552 if (!blk_blk)
3553 {
3554 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
3555 continue;
3556 }
3557 if (blk_blk == (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3558 {
3559 blk_root[i] = 0;
3560 continue;
3561 }
3562 unsigned j = 0; bm::word_t* blk;
3563 do
3564 {
3565 blk = blk_blk[j];
3566 if (!blk)
3567 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
3568 else
3569 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk))
3570 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
3571 else
3572 {
3573 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk))
3574 bm::gap_invert(BMGAP_PTR(blk));
3575 else
3576 bm::bit_invert((wordop_t*)blk);
3577 }
3578 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
3579 } // for i
3580
3581 if (size_ == bm::id_max)
3582 set_bit_no_check(bm::id_max, false);
3583 else
3584 clear_range_no_check(size_, bm::id_max);
3585
3586 return *this;
3587}
3588
3589// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3590
3591template<typename Alloc>
3592bool bvector<Alloc>::get_bit(size_type n) const BMNOEXCEPT
3593{
3594 BM_ASSERT(n < size_);
3595 BM_ASSERT_THROW((n < size_), BM_ERR_RANGE);
3596
3597 // calculate logical block number
3598 unsigned nb = unsigned(n >> bm::set_block_shift);
3599 unsigned i, j;
3600 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i, j);
3601
3602 if (!blockman_.top_blocks_ || i >= blockman_.top_block_size_)
3603 return false;
3604
3605 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blockman_.top_blocks_[i];
3606 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3607 return true;
3608 if (!blk_blk) return false;
3609 if (const bm::word_t* block = blk_blk[j])
3610 {
3611 if (block == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3612 return true;
3613 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
3614 if (BM_IS_GAP(block))
3615 return bm::gap_test_unr(BMGAP_PTR(block), nbit);
3616 return block[nbit >> bm::set_word_shift] &
3617 (1u << (nbit & bm::set_word_mask));
3618 }
3619 return false;
3620}
3621
3622// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3623
3624template<typename Alloc>
3625void bvector<Alloc>::optimize(bm::word_t* temp_block,
3626 optmode opt_mode,
3627 statistics* stat)
3628{
3629 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
3630
3631 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3632 {
3633 if (stat)
3634 calc_stat(stat);
3635 return;
3636 }
3637 if (!temp_block)
3638 temp_block = blockman_.check_allocate_tempblock();
3639
3640 if (stat)
3641 {
3642 stat->reset();
3643 ::memcpy(stat->gap_levels,
3644 blockman_.glen(), sizeof(gap_word_t) * bm::gap_levels);
3645 stat->max_serialize_mem = (unsigned)sizeof(bm::id_t) * 4;
3646 }
3647 blockman_.optimize_tree(temp_block, opt_mode, stat);
3648 if (stat)
3649 {
3650 blockman_.stat_correction(stat);
3651 stat->memory_used += (unsigned)(sizeof(*this) - sizeof(blockman_));
3652 }
3653
3654 // don't need to keep temp block if we optimizing memory usage
3655 blockman_.free_temp_block();
3656}
3657
3658// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3659
3660template<typename Alloc>
3661void bvector<Alloc>::optimize_range(
3662 size_type left,
3663 size_type right,
3664 bm::word_t* temp_block,
3665 optmode opt_mode)
3666{
3667 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
3668 BM_ASSERT(left <= right);
3669 BM_ASSERT(temp_block);
3670
3671 block_idx_type nblock_left = (left >> bm::set_block_shift);
3672 block_idx_type nblock_right = (right >> bm::set_block_shift);
3673
3674 for (; nblock_left <= nblock_right; ++nblock_left)
3675 {
3676 unsigned i0, j0;
3677 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i0, j0);
3678 if (i0 >= blockman_.top_block_size())
3679 break;
3680 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i0, j0);
3681 if (block)
3682 blockman_.optimize_block(i0, j0, block, temp_block, opt_mode, 0);
3683 } // for
3684
3685}
3686
3687// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3688
3689template<typename Alloc>
3690void bvector<Alloc>::optimize_gap_size()
3691{
3692#if 0
3693 if (!blockman_.is_init())
3694 return;
3695
3696 struct bvector<Alloc>::statistics st;
3697 calc_stat(&st);
3698
3699 if (!st.gap_blocks)
3700 return;
3701
3702 gap_word_t opt_glen[bm::gap_levels];
3703 ::memcpy(opt_glen, st.gap_levels, bm::gap_levels * sizeof(*opt_glen));
3704
3705 improve_gap_levels(st.gap_length,
3706 st.gap_length + st.gap_blocks,
3707 opt_glen);
3708
3709 set_gap_levels(opt_glen);
3710#endif
3711}
3712
3713// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3714
3715template<typename Alloc>
3716void bvector<Alloc>::set_gap_levels(const gap_word_t* glevel_len)
3717{
3718 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
3719
3720 if (blockman_.is_init())
3721 {
3722 word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3723 typename
3724 blocks_manager_type::gap_level_func gl_func(blockman_, glevel_len);
3725 for_each_nzblock(blk_root, blockman_.top_block_size(),gl_func);
3726 }
3727
3728 blockman_.set_glen(glevel_len);
3729}
3730
3731// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3732
3733template<typename Alloc>
3734int bvector<Alloc>::compare(const bvector<Alloc>& bv) const BMNOEXCEPT
3735{
3736 int res;
3737 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
3738 unsigned bvect_top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
3739
3740 if (bvect_top_blocks > top_blocks) top_blocks = bvect_top_blocks;
3741
3742 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
3743 {
3744 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i);
3745 const bm::word_t* const* arg_blk_blk = bv.blockman_.get_topblock(i);
3746
3747 if (blk_blk == arg_blk_blk)
3748 continue;
3749
3750 for (unsigned j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
3751 {
3752 const bm::word_t* arg_blk; const bm::word_t* blk;
3753 if ((bm::word_t*)arg_blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3754 arg_blk = FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
3755 else
3756 {
3757 arg_blk = arg_blk_blk ? arg_blk_blk[j] : 0;
3758 if (arg_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3759 arg_blk = FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
3760 }
3761 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3762 blk = FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
3763 else
3764 {
3765 blk = blk_blk ? blk_blk[j] : 0;
3766 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
3767 blk = FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
3768 }
3769 if (blk == arg_blk) continue;
3770
3771 // If one block is zero we check if the other one has at least
3772 // one bit ON
3773
3774 if (!blk || !arg_blk)
3775 {
3776 const bm::word_t* pblk; bool is_gap;
3777
3778 if (blk)
3779 {
3780 pblk = blk;
3781 res = 1;
3782 is_gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
3783 }
3784 else
3785 {
3786 pblk = arg_blk;
3787 res = -1;
3788 is_gap = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk);
3789 }
3790
3791 if (is_gap)
3792 {
3793 if (!bm::gap_is_all_zero(BMGAP_PTR(pblk)))
3794 return res;
3795 }
3796 else
3797 {
3798 if (!bm::bit_is_all_zero(pblk))
3799 return res;
3800 }
3801 continue;
3802 }
3803 bool arg_gap = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk);
3804 bool gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
3805
3806 if (arg_gap != gap)
3807 {
3808 BM_DECLARE_TEMP_BLOCK(temp_blk)
3809 bm::wordop_t* blk1; bm::wordop_t* blk2;
3810
3811 if (gap)
3812 {
3813 bm::gap_convert_to_bitset((bm::word_t*)temp_blk,
3814 BMGAP_PTR(blk));
3815 blk1 = (bm::wordop_t*)temp_blk;
3816 blk2 = (bm::wordop_t*)arg_blk;
3817 }
3818 else
3819 {
3820 bm::gap_convert_to_bitset((bm::word_t*)temp_blk,
3821 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk));
3822 blk1 = (bm::wordop_t*)blk;
3823 blk2 = (bm::wordop_t*)temp_blk;
3824 }
3825 res = bm::bitcmp(blk1, blk2, bm::set_block_size_op);
3826 }
3827 else
3828 {
3829 if (gap)
3830 {
3831 res = bm::gapcmp(BMGAP_PTR(blk), BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk));
3832 }
3833 else
3834 {
3835 res = bm::bitcmp((bm::wordop_t*)blk,
3836 (bm::wordop_t*)arg_blk,
3837 bm::set_block_size_op);
3838 }
3839 }
3840 if (res != 0)
3841 return res;
3842 } // for j
3843
3844 } // for i
3845
3846 return 0;
3847}
3848
3849// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3850
3851template<typename Alloc>
3852bool bvector<Alloc>::find_first_mismatch(
3853 const bvector<Alloc>& bvect, size_type& pos,
3854 size_type search_to) const BMNOEXCEPT
3855{
3856 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
3857 bm::word_t*** top_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3858
3859 if (!top_blocks || !top_root)
3860 {
3861 return bvect.find(pos);
3862 }
3863 bm::word_t*** arg_top_root = bvect.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3864 unsigned i_to, j_to;
3865 {
3866 unsigned bvect_top_blocks = bvect.blockman_.top_block_size();
3867 if (!bvect_top_blocks || !arg_top_root)
3868 {
3869 bool f = this->find(pos);
3870 if (f)
3871 {
3872 if (pos > search_to)
3873 return false;
3874 }
3875 return f;
3876 }
3877
3878 if (bvect_top_blocks > top_blocks)
3879 top_blocks = bvect_top_blocks;
3880 block_idx_type nb_to = (search_to >> bm::set_block_shift);
3881 bm::get_block_coord(nb_to, i_to, j_to);
3882 }
3883 if (i_to < top_blocks)
3884 top_blocks = i_to+1;
3885
3886 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
3887 {
3888 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i);
3889 const bm::word_t* const* arg_blk_blk = bvect.blockman_.get_topblock(i);
3890
3891 if (blk_blk == arg_blk_blk)
3892 {
3893 /* TODO: fix buffer overrread here
3894 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bvect.blockman_.top_block_size_;
3895 if (top_blocks < arg_top_blocks)
3896 arg_top_blocks = top_blocks;
3897 if (i_to < arg_top_blocks)
3898 arg_top_blocks = i_to+1;
3899
3900 // look ahead for top level mismatch
3901 for (++i; i < arg_top_blocks; ++i)
3902 {
3903 if (top_root[i] != arg_top_root[i])
3904 {
3905 blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i);
3906 arg_blk_blk = bvect.blockman_.get_topblock(i);
3907 BM_ASSERT(blk_blk != arg_blk_blk);
3908 goto find_sub_block;
3909 }
3910 }
3911 */
3912 continue;
3913 }
3914 //find_sub_block:
3915 unsigned j = 0;
3916 do
3917 {
3918 const bm::word_t* arg_blk; const bm::word_t* blk;
3919 arg_blk = ((bm::word_t*)arg_blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) ?
3920 FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR :
3921 arg_blk_blk ? (BLOCK_ADDR_SAN(arg_blk_blk[j])) : 0;
3922 blk = ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) ?
3923 FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR :
3924 (blk_blk ? (BLOCK_ADDR_SAN(blk_blk[j])) : 0);
3925 if (blk == arg_blk)
3926 continue;
3927
3928 unsigned block_pos;
3929 bool found = bm::block_find_first_diff(blk, arg_blk, &block_pos);
3930 if (found)
3931 {
3932 pos =
3933 (size_type(i) * bm::set_sub_array_size * bm::gap_max_bits) +
3934 (size_type(j) * bm::gap_max_bits) + block_pos;
3935 if (pos > search_to)
3936 return false;
3937 return true;
3938 }
3939
3940 if (i == i_to)
3941 {
3942 if (j >= j_to)
3943 return false;
3944 }
3945
3946 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
3947 } // for i
3948
3949 return false;
3950
3951}
3952
3953// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3954
3955template<typename Alloc>
3956void bvector<Alloc>::swap(bvector<Alloc>& bvect) BMNOEXCEPT
3957{
3958 if (this != &bvect)
3959 {
3960 blockman_.swap(bvect.blockman_);
3961 bm::xor_swap(size_,bvect.size_);
3962 }
3963}
3964
3965// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
3966
3967template<typename Alloc>
3968void bvector<Alloc>::calc_stat(
3969 struct bvector<Alloc>::statistics* st) const BMNOEXCEPT
3970{
3971 BM_ASSERT(st);
3972
3973 st->reset();
3974 ::memcpy(st->gap_levels,
3975 blockman_.glen(), sizeof(gap_word_t) * bm::gap_levels);
3976
3977 st->max_serialize_mem = unsigned(sizeof(bm::id_t) * 4);
3978 unsigned top_size = blockman_.top_block_size();
3979
3980 size_t blocks_mem = sizeof(blockman_);
3981 blocks_mem +=
3982 (blockman_.temp_block_ ? sizeof(bm::word_t) * bm::set_block_size : 0);
3983 blocks_mem += sizeof(bm::word_t**) * top_size;
3984 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
3985
3986 if (blk_root)
3987 {
3988 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_size; ++i)
3989 {
3990 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blk_root[i];
3991 if (!blk_blk)
3992 {
3993 ++i;
3994 bool found = bm::find_not_null_ptr(blk_root, i, top_size, &i);
3995 if (!found)
3996 break;
3997 blk_blk = blk_root[i];
3998 BM_ASSERT(blk_blk);
3999 if (!blk_blk)
4000 break;
4001 }
4002 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4003 continue;
4004 st->ptr_sub_blocks++;
4005 for (unsigned j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
4006 {
4007 const bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
4008 if (IS_VALID_ADDR(blk))
4009 {
4010 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk))
4011 {
4012 const bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
4013 unsigned cap;
4014 unsigned len = gap_length(gap_blk);
4015 cap = is_ro() ? len
4016 : bm::gap_capacity(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
4017 unsigned level = bm::gap_level(gap_blk);
4018 st->add_gap_block(cap, len, level);
4019 }
4020 else // bit block
4021 st->add_bit_block();
4022 }
4023 } // for j
4024 } // for i
4025
4026 size_t full_null_size = blockman_.calc_serialization_null_full();
4027 st->max_serialize_mem += full_null_size;
4028
4029 } // if blk_root
4030
4031 size_t safe_inc = st->max_serialize_mem / 10; // 10% increment
4032 if (!safe_inc) safe_inc = 256;
4033 st->max_serialize_mem += safe_inc;
4034
4035 // Calc size of different odd and temporary things.
4036 st->memory_used += unsigned(sizeof(*this) - sizeof(blockman_));
4037 blocks_mem += st->ptr_sub_blocks * (sizeof(void*) * bm::set_sub_array_size);
4038 st->memory_used += blocks_mem;
4039 if (is_ro())
4040 st->memory_used += sizeof(typename blocks_manager_type::arena);
4041 st->bv_count = 1;
4042
4043}
4044
4045// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4046
4047template<typename Alloc>
4048void bvector<Alloc>::fill_alloc_digest(bvector<Alloc>& bv_blocks) const
4049{
4050 bv_blocks.init();
4051
4052 unsigned top_size = blockman_.top_block_size();
4053 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
4054 if (blk_root)
4055 {
4056 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_size; ++i)
4057 {
4058 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blk_root[i];
4059 if (!blk_blk || ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR))
4060 continue;
4061 for (unsigned j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
4062 {
4063 const bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
4064 if (IS_VALID_ADDR(blk))
4065 {
4066 size_type nb = i * bm::set_sub_array_size + j;
4067 bv_blocks.set_bit_no_check(nb);
4068 }
4069 } // for j
4070 } // for i
4071 } // if blk_root
4072}
4073
4074
4075// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4076
4077template<class Alloc>
4078void bvector<Alloc>::set(const size_type* ids,
4079 size_type ids_size, bm::sort_order so)
4080{
4081 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4082
4083 if (!ids || !ids_size)
4084 return; // nothing to do
4085 if (!blockman_.is_init())
4086 blockman_.init_tree();
4087
4088 import(ids, ids_size, so);
4089 sync_size();
4090}
4091
4092// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4093
4094template<class Alloc>
4095void bvector<Alloc>::keep(const size_type* ids, size_type ids_size,
4096 bm::sort_order so)
4097{
4098 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4099
4100 if (!ids || !ids_size || !blockman_.is_init())
4101 {
4102 clear();
4103 return;
4104 }
4105 bvector<Alloc> bv_tmp; // TODO: better optimize for SORTED case (avoid temp)
4106 bv_tmp.import(ids, ids_size, so);
4107
4108 size_type last;
4109 bool found = bv_tmp.find_reverse(last);
4110 if (found)
4111 {
4112 bv_tmp.resize(last+1);
4113 bit_and(bv_tmp);
4114 }
4115 else
4116 {
4117 BM_ASSERT(0);
4118 clear();
4119 }
4120}
4121
4122// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4123
4124template<class Alloc>
4125void bvector<Alloc>::clear(bool free_mem) BMNOEXCEPT
4126{
4127 if (is_ro())
4128 {
4129 BM_ASSERT(free_mem);
4130 blockman_.destroy_arena();
4131 }
4132 else
4133 blockman_.set_all_zero(free_mem);
4134}
4135
4136// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4137
4138template<class Alloc>
4139void bvector<Alloc>::clear(const size_type* ids,
4140 size_type ids_size, bm::sort_order so)
4141{
4142 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4143
4144 if (!ids || !ids_size || !blockman_.is_init())
4145 {
4146 return;
4147 }
4148 bvector<Alloc> bv_tmp; // TODO: better optimize for SORTED case (avoid temp)
4149 bv_tmp.import(ids, ids_size, so);
4150
4151 size_type last;
4152 bool found = bv_tmp.find_reverse(last);
4153 if (found)
4154 {
4155 bv_tmp.resize(last+1);
4156 bit_sub(bv_tmp);
4157 }
4158 else
4159 {
4160 BM_ASSERT(0);
4161 }
4162}
4163
4164// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4165
4166template<class Alloc>
4167bvector<Alloc>& bvector<Alloc>::set()
4168{
4169 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4170
4171 set_range(0, size_ - 1, true);
4172 return *this;
4173}
4174
4175// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4176
4177template<class Alloc>
4178bvector<Alloc>& bvector<Alloc>::set(size_type n, bool val)
4179{
4180 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4181
4182 set_bit(n, val);
4183 return *this;
4184}
4185
4186// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4187
4188template<class Alloc>
4189bool bvector<Alloc>::set_bit_conditional(size_type n, bool val, bool condition)
4190{
4191 if (val == condition) return false;
4192 if (n >= size_)
4193 {
4194 size_type new_size = (n == bm::id_max) ? bm::id_max : n + 1;
4195 resize(new_size);
4196 }
4197 return set_bit_conditional_impl(n, val, condition);
4198}
4199
4200// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4201
4202template<class Alloc>
4203bool bvector<Alloc>::set_bit_and(size_type n, bool val)
4204{
4205 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4206 BM_ASSERT(n < size_);
4207 BM_ASSERT_THROW(n < size_, BM_ERR_RANGE);
4208
4209 if (!blockman_.is_init())
4210 blockman_.init_tree();
4211 return and_bit_no_check(n, val);
4212}
4213
4214// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4215
4216template<class Alloc>
4217bool bvector<Alloc>::set_bit(size_type n, bool val)
4218{
4219 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4220 BM_ASSERT_THROW(n < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
4221
4222 if (!blockman_.is_init())
4223 blockman_.init_tree();
4224 if (n >= size_)
4225 {
4226 size_type new_size = (n == bm::id_max) ? bm::id_max : n + 1;
4227 resize(new_size);
4228 }
4229 return set_bit_no_check(n, val);
4230}
4231
4232// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4233
4234template<class Alloc>
4235void bvector<Alloc>::import(const size_type* ids, size_type size_in,
4236 bm::sort_order sorted_idx)
4237{
4238 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4239
4240 size_type n, start(0), stop(size_in);
4241 block_idx_type nblock;
4242
4243 n = ids[start];
4244 nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4245
4246 switch(sorted_idx)
4247 {
4248 case BM_SORTED:
4249 {
4250 block_idx_type nblock_end = (ids[size_in-1] >> bm::set_block_shift);
4251 if (nblock == nblock_end) // special case: one block import
4252 {
4253 import_block(ids, nblock, 0, stop);
4254 return;
4255 }
4256 }
4257 break;
4258 default:
4259 break;
4260 } // switch
4261
4262 do
4263 {
4264 n = ids[start];
4265 nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4266 #ifdef BM64ADDR
4267 stop = bm::idx_arr_block_lookup_u64(ids, size_in, nblock, start);
4268 #else
4269 stop = bm::idx_arr_block_lookup_u32(ids, size_in, nblock, start);
4270 #endif
4271 BM_ASSERT(start < stop);
4272 import_block(ids, nblock, start, stop);
4273 start = stop;
4274 } while (start < size_in);
4275}
4276
4277// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4278
4279template<class Alloc>
4280void bvector<Alloc>::import_sorted(const size_type* ids,
4281 const size_type size_in)
4282{
4283 BM_ASSERT(size_in);
4284 BM_ASSERT(ids[0] < bm::id_max); // limit is 2^31-1 (for 32-bit mode)
4285 BM_ASSERT(ids[size_in-1] < bm::id_max);
4286
4287 size_type n, start(0), stop = size_in;
4288 block_idx_type nblock, nblock_end;
4289
4290 n = ids[start];
4291 nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4292 nblock_end = (ids[size_in-1] >> bm::set_block_shift);
4293
4294 if (nblock == nblock_end) // special (but frequent)case: one block import
4295 {
4296 import_block(ids, nblock, 0, stop);
4297 unsigned nbit = unsigned(ids[size_in-1] & bm::set_block_mask);
4298 if (nbit == 65535) // last bit in block
4299 {
4300 unsigned i, j;
4301 bm::get_block_coord(nblock, i, j);
4302 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j);
4303 }
4304 }
4305 else
4306 {
4307 do
4308 {
4309 // TODO: use one-sided binary search to find the block limits
4310 #ifdef BM64ADDR
4311 stop = bm::idx_arr_block_lookup_u64(ids, size_in, nblock, start);
4312 #else
4313 stop = bm::idx_arr_block_lookup_u32(ids, size_in, nblock, start);
4314 #endif
4315 BM_ASSERT(start < stop);
4316
4317 import_block(ids, nblock, start, stop);
4318 start = stop;
4319 nblock = (ids[stop] >> bm::set_block_shift);
4320 } while (start < size_in);
4321
4322 // multi-block sorted import, lets optimize
4323 n = ids[start];
4324 nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4325 nblock_end = (ids[size_in-1] >> bm::set_block_shift);
4326 unsigned nbit = unsigned(ids[size_in-1] & bm::set_block_mask);
4327 nblock_end += bool(nbit == 65535);
4328 do
4329 {
4330 unsigned i, j;
4331 bm::get_block_coord(nblock++, i, j);
4332 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j);
4333 } while (nblock < nblock_end);
4334
4335 }
4336}
4337
4338
4339// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4340
4341template<class Alloc>
4342void bvector<Alloc>::import_block(const size_type* ids,
4343 block_idx_type nblock,
4344 size_type start,
4345 size_type stop)
4346{
4347 BM_ASSERT(stop > start);
4348 int block_type;
4349 bm::word_t* blk =
4350 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock, 1, 0, &block_type,
4351 true/*allow NULL ret*/);
4352 if (!IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk))
4353 {
4354 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk))
4355 {
4356 if (stop-start == 1)
4357 {
4358 unsigned nbit = unsigned(ids[0] & bm::set_block_mask);
4359 gap_block_set_no_ret(BMGAP_PTR(blk), true, nblock, nbit);
4360 return;
4361 }
4362 blk = blockman_.deoptimize_block(nblock); // TODO: try to avoid
4363 }
4364 #ifdef BM64ADDR
4365 bm::set_block_bits_u64(blk, ids, start, stop);
4366 #else
4367 bm::set_block_bits_u32(blk, ids, start, stop);
4368 #endif
4369 if (nblock == bm::set_total_blocks-1)
4370 blk[bm::set_block_size-1] &= ~(1u<<31);
4371 }
4372}
4373
4374// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4375
4376template<class Alloc>
4377bool bvector<Alloc>::set_bit_no_check(size_type n, bool val)
4378{
4379 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4380 BM_ASSERT_THROW(n < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
4381
4382 // calculate logical block number
4383 block_idx_type nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4384
4385 int block_type;
4386 bm::word_t* blk =
4387 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock,
4388 val,
4389 get_new_blocks_strat(),
4390 &block_type);
4391
4392 if (!IS_VALID_ADDR(blk))
4393 return false;
4394
4395 // calculate word number in block and bit
4396 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
4397 if (block_type) // gap
4398 {
4399 return gap_block_set(BMGAP_PTR(blk), val, nblock, nbit);
4400 }
4401 else // bit block
4402 {
4403 unsigned nword = unsigned(nbit >> bm::set_word_shift);
4404 nbit &= bm::set_word_mask;
4405 bm::word_t* word = blk + nword;
4406 bm::word_t mask = (((bm::word_t)1) << nbit);
4407
4408 if (val)
4409 {
4410 val = ~(*word & mask);
4411 *word |= mask; // set bit
4412 return val;
4413 }
4414 else
4415 {
4416 val = ~(*word & mask);
4417 *word &= ~~mask; // clear bit
4418 return val;
4419 }
4420 }
4421}
4422
4423// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4424
4425template<class Alloc>
4426void bvector<Alloc>::set_bit_no_check(size_type n)
4427{
4428 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4429 BM_ASSERT_THROW(n < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
4430
4431 const bool val = true; // set bit
4432
4433 block_idx_type nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4434 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
4435
4436 int block_type;
4437 bm::word_t* blk =
4438 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock,
4439 val,
4440 get_new_blocks_strat(),
4441 &block_type);
4442 if (!IS_VALID_ADDR(blk))
4443 return;
4444
4445 if (block_type) // gap block
4446 {
4447 this->gap_block_set_no_ret(BMGAP_PTR(blk), val, nblock, nbit);
4448 }
4449 else // bit block
4450 {
4451 unsigned nword = nbit >> bm::set_word_shift;
4452 nbit &= bm::set_word_mask;
4453 blk[nword] |= (1u << nbit); // set bit
4454 }
4455}
4456
4457// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4458
4459template<class Alloc>
4460void bvector<Alloc>::clear_bit_no_check(size_type n)
4461{
4462 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4463 BM_ASSERT_THROW(n < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
4464
4465 const bool val = false; // clear bit
4466
4467 block_idx_type nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4468 int block_type;
4469 bm::word_t* blk =
4470 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock,
4471 val,
4472 get_new_blocks_strat(),
4473 &block_type);
4474 if (!blk)
4475 return;
4476
4477 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
4478 if (block_type) // gap
4479 {
4480 this->gap_block_set_no_ret(BMGAP_PTR(blk), val, nblock, nbit);
4481 }
4482 else // bit block
4483 {
4484 unsigned nword = unsigned(nbit >> bm::set_word_shift);
4485 nbit &= bm::set_word_mask;
4486 blk[nword] &= ~(1u << nbit); // clear bit
4487 }
4488}
4489
4490
4491// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4492
4493template<class Alloc>
4494bool bvector<Alloc>::gap_block_set(bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk,
4495 bool val, block_idx_type nblock,
4496 unsigned nbit)
4497{
4498 unsigned is_set, new_len, old_len;
4499 old_len = bm::gap_length(gap_blk)-1;
4500 new_len = bm::gap_set_value(val, gap_blk, nbit, &is_set);
4501 if (old_len < new_len)
4502 {
4503 unsigned threshold = bm::gap_limit(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
4504 if (new_len > threshold)
4505 blockman_.extend_gap_block(nblock, gap_blk);
4506 }
4507 return is_set;
4508}
4509
4510// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4511
4512template<class Alloc>
4513void bvector<Alloc>::gap_block_set_no_ret(bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk,
4514 bool val, block_idx_type nblock, unsigned nbit)
4515{
4516 unsigned new_len, old_len;
4517 old_len = bm::gap_length(gap_blk)-1;
4518 new_len = bm::gap_set_value(val, gap_blk, nbit);
4519 if (old_len < new_len)
4520 {
4521 unsigned threshold = bm::gap_limit(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
4522 if (new_len > threshold)
4523 blockman_.extend_gap_block(nblock, gap_blk);
4524 }
4525}
4526
4527
4528// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4529
4530template<class Alloc>
4531bool bvector<Alloc>::inc(size_type n)
4532{
4533 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4534 // calculate logical block number
4535 block_idx_type nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4536 bm::word_t* blk =
4537 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock,
4538 get_new_blocks_strat());
4539 BM_ASSERT(IS_VALID_ADDR(blk));
4540
4541 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
4542
4543 unsigned is_set;
4544 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk))
4545 {
4546 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
4547 is_set = (bm::gap_test_unr(gap_blk, nbit) != 0);
4548 this->gap_block_set(gap_blk, !is_set, nblock, nbit); // flip
4549 }
4550 else // bit block
4551 {
4552 unsigned nword = unsigned(nbit >> bm::set_word_shift);
4553 nbit &= bm::set_word_mask;
4554
4555 bm::word_t* word = blk + nword;
4556 bm::word_t mask = (((bm::word_t)1) << nbit);
4557 is_set = ((*word) & mask);
4558
4559 *word = (is_set) ? (*word & ~mask) : (*word | mask);
4560 }
4561 return is_set;
4562}
4563
4564// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4565
4566template<class Alloc>
4567bool bvector<Alloc>::set_bit_conditional_impl(size_type n,
4568 bool val,
4569 bool condition)
4570{
4571 // calculate logical block number
4572 block_idx_type nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4573 int block_type;
4574 bm::word_t* blk =
4575 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock,
4576 val,
4577 get_new_blocks_strat(),
4578 &block_type);
4579 if (!IS_VALID_ADDR(blk))
4580 return false;
4581
4582 // calculate word number in block and bit
4583 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
4584
4585 if (block_type == 1) // gap
4586 {
4587 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
4588 unsigned is_set = gap_block_set(gap_blk, val, nblock, nbit);
4589 return is_set;
4590 }
4591 else // bit block
4592 {
4593 unsigned nword = unsigned(nbit >> bm::set_word_shift);
4594 nbit &= bm::set_word_mask;
4595
4596 bm::word_t* word = blk + nword;
4597 bm::word_t mask = (((bm::word_t)1) << nbit);
4598 bool is_set = ((*word) & mask) != 0;
4599
4600 if (is_set != condition)
4601 return false;
4602 if (is_set != val) // need to change bit
4603 {
4604 if (val) // set bit
4605 *word |= mask;
4606 else // clear bit
4607 *word &= ~~mask;
4608 return true;
4609 }
4610 }
4611 return false;
4612
4613}
4614
4615// -----------------------------------------------------------------------
4616
4617
4618template<class Alloc>
4619bool bvector<Alloc>::and_bit_no_check(size_type n, bool val)
4620{
4621 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
4622 // calculate logical block number
4623 block_idx_type nblock = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
4624
4625 int block_type;
4626 bm::word_t* blk =
4627 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock,
4628 val,
4629 get_new_blocks_strat(),
4630 &block_type);
4631 if (!IS_VALID_ADDR(blk))
4632 return false;
4633
4634 // calculate word number in block and bit
4635 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
4636
4637 if (block_type == 1) // gap
4638 {
4639 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
4640 bool old_val = (bm::gap_test_unr(gap_blk, nbit) != 0);
4641
4642 bool new_val = val & old_val;
4643 if (new_val != old_val)
4644 {
4645 unsigned is_set = gap_block_set(gap_blk, val, nblock, nbit);
4646 BM_ASSERT(is_set);
4647 return is_set;
4648 }
4649 }
4650 else // bit block
4651 {
4652 unsigned nword = unsigned(nbit >> bm::set_word_shift);
4653 nbit &= bm::set_word_mask;
4654
4655 bm::word_t* word = blk + nword;
4656 bm::word_t mask = (((bm::word_t)1) << nbit);
4657 bool is_set = ((*word) & mask) != 0;
4658
4659 bool new_val = is_set & val;
4660 if (new_val != val) // need to change bit
4661 {
4662 if (new_val) // set bit
4663 {
4664 *word |= mask;
4665 }
4666 else // clear bit
4667 {
4668 *word &= ~~mask;
4669 }
4670 return true;
4671 }
4672 }
4673 return false;
4674}
4675
4676//---------------------------------------------------------------------
4677
4678template<class Alloc>
4679bool bvector<Alloc>::find(size_type from, size_type& pos) const BMNOEXCEPT
4680{
4681 if (from == bm::id_max)
4682 return false;
4683 if (!from)
4684 {
4685 return find(pos);
4686 }
4687 pos = check_or_next(from);
4688 return (pos != 0);
4689}
4690
4691//---------------------------------------------------------------------
4692
4693template<class Alloc>
4694bool bvector<Alloc>::find_reverse(size_type& pos) const BMNOEXCEPT
4695{
4696 bool found;
4697
4698 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
4699 if (!top_blocks)
4700 return false;
4701 for (unsigned i = top_blocks-1; true; --i)
4702 {
4703 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i);
4704 if (blk_blk)
4705 {
4706 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4707 blk_blk = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
4708
4709 for (unsigned short j = bm::set_sub_array_size-1; true; --j)
4710 {
4711 const bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
4712 if (blk)
4713 {
4714 unsigned block_pos;
4715 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4716 {
4717 block_pos = bm::gap_max_bits-1;
4718 found = true;
4719 }
4720 else
4721 {
4722 bool is_gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
4723 found = is_gap ? bm::gap_find_last(BMGAP_PTR(blk), &block_pos)
4724 : bm::bit_find_last(blk, &block_pos);
4725 }
4726 if (found)
4727 {
4728 block_idx_type base_idx =
4729 block_idx_type(i) * bm::set_sub_array_size *
4730 bm::gap_max_bits;
4731 base_idx += j * bm::gap_max_bits;
4732 pos = base_idx + block_pos;
4733 return found;
4734 }
4735 }
4736
4737 if (j == 0)
4738 break;
4739 } // for j
4740 } // if blk_blk
4741
4742 if (i == 0)
4743 break;
4744 } // for i
4745 return false;
4746}
4747
4748//---------------------------------------------------------------------
4749
4750template<class Alloc>
4751bool bvector<Alloc>::find_reverse(size_type from, size_type& pos) const BMNOEXCEPT
4752{
4753 bool found;
4754 if (!blockman_.is_init())
4755 return false; // nothing to do
4756 if (!from)
4757 {
4758 pos = from;
4759 return this->test(from);
4760 }
4761
4762 block_idx_type nb = (from >> bm::set_block_shift);
4763 unsigned i0, j0;
4764 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i0, j0);
4765
4766 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i0, j0);
4767 if (block)
4768 {
4769 size_type base_idx;
4770 unsigned found_nbit;
4771 unsigned nbit = unsigned(from & bm::set_block_mask);
4772 found = bm::block_find_reverse(block, nbit, &found_nbit);
4773 if (found)
4774 {
4775 base_idx = bm::get_block_start<size_type>(i0, j0);
4776 pos = base_idx + found_nbit;
4777 return found;
4778 }
4779 }
4780
4781 if (nb)
4782 --nb;
4783 else
4784 return false;
4785 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i0, j0);
4786
4787 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i0);
4788 if (blk_blk)
4789 {
4790 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4791 blk_blk = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
4792 for (unsigned j = j0; true; --j)
4793 {
4794 const bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
4795 if (blk)
4796 {
4797 unsigned block_pos;
4798 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4799 {
4800 block_pos = bm::gap_max_bits-1;
4801 found = true;
4802 }
4803 else
4804 {
4805 bool is_gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
4806 found = is_gap ? bm::gap_find_last(BMGAP_PTR(blk), &block_pos)
4807 : bm::bit_find_last(blk, &block_pos);
4808 }
4809 if (found)
4810 {
4811 block_idx_type base_idx =
4812 block_idx_type(i0) * bm::set_sub_array_size *
4813 bm::gap_max_bits;
4814 base_idx += j * bm::gap_max_bits;
4815 pos = base_idx + block_pos;
4816 return found;
4817 }
4818 }
4819 if (!j)
4820 break;
4821 } // for j
4822 }
4823 if (i0)
4824 --i0;
4825 else
4826 return false;
4827
4828 for (unsigned i = i0; true; --i)
4829 {
4830 blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i);
4831 if (blk_blk)
4832 {
4833 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4834 blk_blk = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
4835 for (unsigned short j = bm::set_sub_array_size-1; true; --j)
4836 {
4837 const bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
4838 if (blk)
4839 {
4840 unsigned block_pos;
4841 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4842 {
4843 block_pos = bm::gap_max_bits-1;
4844 found = true;
4845 }
4846 else
4847 {
4848 bool is_gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
4849 found = is_gap ? bm::gap_find_last(BMGAP_PTR(blk), &block_pos)
4850 : bm::bit_find_last(blk, &block_pos);
4851 }
4852 if (found)
4853 {
4854 block_idx_type base_idx =
4855 block_idx_type(i) * bm::set_sub_array_size *
4856 bm::gap_max_bits;
4857 base_idx += j * bm::gap_max_bits;
4858 pos = base_idx + block_pos;
4859 return found;
4860 }
4861 }
4862 if (!j)
4863 break;
4864 } // for j
4865 }
4866 if (i == 0)
4867 break;
4868 } // for i
4869
4870 return false;
4871}
4872
4873//---------------------------------------------------------------------
4874
4875template<class Alloc>
4876bool bvector<Alloc>::find(size_type& pos) const BMNOEXCEPT
4877{
4878 bool found;
4879
4880 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
4881 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
4882 {
4883 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i);
4884 if (blk_blk)
4885 {
4886 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4887 blk_blk = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
4888
4889 for (unsigned j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
4890 {
4891 const bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
4892 if (blk)
4893 {
4894 unsigned block_pos;
4895 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
4896 {
4897 found = true; block_pos = 0;
4898 }
4899 else
4900 {
4901 bool is_gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
4902 found = (is_gap) ? bm::gap_find_first(BMGAP_PTR(blk), &block_pos)
4903 : bm::bit_find_first(blk, &block_pos);
4904 }
4905 if (found)
4906 {
4907 size_type base_idx = block_idx_type(i) * bm::bits_in_array;
4908 base_idx += j * bm::gap_max_bits;
4909 pos = base_idx + block_pos;
4910 return found;
4911 }
4912 }
4913 } // for j
4914 } // if blk_blk
4915 } // for i
4916 return false;
4917}
4918
4919//---------------------------------------------------------------------
4920
4921template<class Alloc>
4922bool bvector<Alloc>::find_range(size_type& in_first,
4923 size_type& in_last) const BMNOEXCEPT
4924{
4925 bool found = find(in_first);
4926 if (found)
4927 {
4928 found = find_reverse(in_last);
4929 BM_ASSERT(found);
4930 BM_ASSERT(in_first <= in_last);
4931 }
4932 else
4933 {
4934 in_first = in_last = 0; // zero the output just in case
4935 }
4936 return found;
4937}
4938
4939//---------------------------------------------------------------------
4940
4941template<class Alloc>
4942bool bvector<Alloc>::find_rank(size_type rank_in,
4943 size_type from,
4944 size_type& pos) const BMNOEXCEPT
4945{
4946 BM_ASSERT_THROW(from < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
4947
4948 bool ret = false;
4949
4950 if (!rank_in || !blockman_.is_init())
4951 return ret;
4952
4953 block_idx_type nb = (from >> bm::set_block_shift);
4954 bm::gap_word_t nbit = bm::gap_word_t(from & bm::set_block_mask);
4955 unsigned bit_pos = 0;
4956
4957 for (; nb < bm::set_total_blocks; ++nb)
4958 {
4959 int no_more_blocks;
4960 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block(nb, &no_more_blocks);
4961 if (block)
4962 {
4963 if (!nbit && (rank_in > bm::gap_max_bits)) // requested rank cannot be in this block
4964 {
4965 unsigned cnt = blockman_.block_bitcount(block);
4966 BM_ASSERT(cnt < rank_in);
4967 rank_in -= cnt;
4968 continue;
4969 }
4970 else
4971 {
4972 rank_in = bm::block_find_rank(block, rank_in, nbit, bit_pos);
4973 if (!rank_in) // target found
4974 {
4975 pos = bit_pos + (nb * bm::set_block_size * 32);
4976 return true;
4977 }
4978 }
4979 }
4980 else
4981 {
4982 // TODO: better next block search
4983 if (no_more_blocks)
4984 break;
4985 }
4986 nbit ^= nbit; // zero start bit after first scanned block
4987 } // for nb
4988
4989 return ret;
4990}
4991
4992//---------------------------------------------------------------------
4993
4994template<class Alloc>
4995bool bvector<Alloc>::find_rank(size_type rank_in,
4996 size_type from,
4997 size_type& pos,
4998 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) const BMNOEXCEPT
4999{
5000 BM_ASSERT_THROW(from < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
5001
5002 bool ret = false;
5003
5004 if (!rank_in ||
5005 !blockman_.is_init() ||
5006 (rs_idx.count() < rank_in))
5007 return ret;
5008
5009 block_idx_type nb;
5010 if (from)
5011 nb = (from >> bm::set_block_shift);
5012 else
5013 {
5014 nb = rs_idx.find(rank_in);
5015 BM_ASSERT(rs_idx.rcount(nb) >= rank_in);
5016 if (nb)
5017 rank_in -= rs_idx.rcount(nb-1);
5018 }
5019
5020 bm::gap_word_t nbit = bm::gap_word_t(from & bm::set_block_mask);
5021 unsigned bit_pos = 0;
5022
5023 for (; nb < rs_idx.get_total(); ++nb)
5024 {
5025 int no_more_blocks;
5026 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block(nb, &no_more_blocks);
5027 if (block)
5028 {
5029 if (!nbit) // check if the whole block can be skipped
5030 {
5031 unsigned block_bc = rs_idx.count(nb);
5032 if (rank_in <= block_bc) // target block
5033 {
5034 nbit = rs_idx.select_sub_range(nb, rank_in);
5035 rank_in = bm::block_find_rank(block, rank_in, nbit, bit_pos);
5036 BM_ASSERT(rank_in == 0);
5037 pos = bit_pos + (nb * bm::set_block_size * 32);
5038 return true;
5039 }
5040 rank_in -= block_bc;
5041 continue;
5042 }
5043
5044 rank_in = bm::block_find_rank(block, rank_in, nbit, bit_pos);
5045 if (!rank_in) // target found
5046 {
5047 pos = bit_pos + (nb * bm::set_block_size * 32);
5048 return true;
5049 }
5050 }
5051 else
5052 {
5053 // TODO: better next block search
5054 if (no_more_blocks)
5055 break;
5056 }
5057 nbit ^= nbit; // zero start bit after first scanned block
5058 } // for nb
5059
5060 return ret;
5061}
5062
5063//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5064
5065template<class Alloc>
5066bool bvector<Alloc>::select(size_type rank_in, size_type& pos,
5067 const rs_index_type& rs_idx) const BMNOEXCEPT
5068{
5069 bool ret = false;
5070
5071 if (!rank_in ||
5072 !blockman_.is_init() ||
5073 (rs_idx.count() < rank_in))
5074 return ret;
5075
5076 block_idx_type nb;
5077 bm::gap_word_t sub_range_from;
5078 bool found = rs_idx.find(&rank_in, &nb, &sub_range_from);
5079 if (!found)
5080 return found;
5081
5082 unsigned i, j;
5083 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i, j);
5084 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
5085 BM_ASSERT(block);
5086 BM_ASSERT(rank_in <= rs_idx.count(nb));
5087
5088 unsigned bit_pos = 0;
5089 if (block == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5090 {
5091 BM_ASSERT(rank_in <= bm::gap_max_bits);
5092 bit_pos = sub_range_from + unsigned(rank_in) - 1;
5093 }
5094 else
5095 {
5096 rank_in = bm::block_find_rank(block, rank_in, sub_range_from, bit_pos);
5097 BM_ASSERT(rank_in == 0);
5098 }
5099 pos = bit_pos + (nb * bm::set_block_size * 32);
5100 return true;
5101}
5102
5103//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5104
5105template<class Alloc>
5106typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
5107bvector<Alloc>::check_or_next(size_type prev) const BMNOEXCEPT
5108{
5109 if (!blockman_.is_init())
5110 return 0;
5111
5112 // calculate logical block number
5113 block_idx_type nb = (prev >> bm::set_block_shift);
5114 unsigned i, j;
5115 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i, j);
5116 const bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
5117
5118 if (block)
5119 {
5120 unsigned block_pos;
5121 bool found = false;
5122 // calculate word number in block and bit
5123 unsigned nbit = unsigned(prev & bm::set_block_mask);
5124 if (BM_IS_GAP(block))
5125 {
5126 if (bm::gap_block_find(BMGAP_PTR(block), nbit, &block_pos))
5127 {
5128 prev = (size_type(nb) * bm::gap_max_bits) + block_pos;
5129 return prev;
5130 }
5131 }
5132 else
5133 {
5134 if (block == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5135 return prev;
5136 found = bm::bit_block_find(block, nbit, &block_pos);
5137 if (found)
5138 {
5139 prev = (size_type(nb) * bm::gap_max_bits) + block_pos;
5140 return prev;
5141 }
5142 }
5143 }
5144 ++j;
5145 block_idx_type top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
5146 for (; i < top_blocks; ++i)
5147 {
5148 const bm::word_t* const* blk_blk = blockman_.get_topblock(i);
5149 if (blk_blk)
5150 {
5151 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5152 blk_blk = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
5153
5154 for (; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
5155 {
5156 const bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
5157 if (blk)
5158 {
5159 bool found;
5160 unsigned block_pos;
5161 if (blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5162 {
5163 found = true; block_pos = 0;
5164 }
5165 else
5166 {
5167 bool is_gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
5168 found = (is_gap) ? bm::gap_find_first(BMGAP_PTR(blk), &block_pos)
5169 : bm::bit_find_first(blk, &block_pos);
5170 }
5171 if (found)
5172 {
5173 size_type base_idx = size_type(i) * bm::bits_in_array;
5174 base_idx += j * bm::gap_max_bits;
5175 prev = base_idx + block_pos;
5176 return prev;
5177 }
5178 }
5179 } // for j
5180 }
5181 j = 0;
5182 } // for i
5183
5184 return 0;
5185}
5186
5187//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5188
5189template<class Alloc>
5190typename bvector<Alloc>::size_type
5191bvector<Alloc>::check_or_next_extract(size_type prev)
5192{
5193 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5194 if (!blockman_.is_init())
5195 return 0;
5196 // TODO: optimization
5197 size_type pos = this->check_or_next(prev);
5198 if (pos >= prev)
5199 this->clear_bit_no_check(pos);
5200 return pos;
5201}
5202
5203//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5204
5205template<class Alloc>
5206bool bvector<Alloc>::shift_right()
5207{
5208 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5209 return insert(0, false);
5210}
5211
5212//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5213
5214template<class Alloc>
5215bool bvector<Alloc>::shift_left()
5216{
5217 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5218 bool b = this->test(0);
5219 this->erase(0);
5220 return b;
5221}
5222
5223//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5224
5225template<class Alloc>
5226bool bvector<Alloc>::insert(size_type n, bool value)
5227{
5228 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5229 BM_ASSERT_THROW(n < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
5230
5231 if (size_ < bm::id_max)
5232 ++size_;
5233 if (!blockman_.is_init())
5234 {
5235 if (value)
5236 set(n);
5237 return 0;
5238 }
5239
5240 // calculate logical block number
5241 block_idx_type nb = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
5242
5243 int block_type;
5244 bm::word_t carry_over = 0;
5245
5246 // 1: process target block insertion
5247 if (value || n)
5248 {
5249 unsigned i, j;
5250 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i, j);
5251 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
5252
5253 const unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
5254 if (!block)
5255 {
5256 if (value)
5257 {
5258 block = blockman_.check_allocate_block(nb, get_new_blocks_strat());
5259 goto insert_bit_check;
5260 }
5261 }
5262 else
5263 {
5264 insert_bit_check:
5265 if (BM_IS_GAP(block))
5266 {
5267 unsigned new_block_len;
5268 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(block);
5269 carry_over = bm::gap_insert(gap_blk, nbit, value, &new_block_len);
5270 unsigned threshold = bm::gap_limit(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
5271 if (new_block_len > threshold)
5272 blockman_.extend_gap_block(nb, gap_blk);
5273 }
5274 else
5275 {
5276 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(block))
5277 {
5278 if (!value)
5279 {
5280 block = blockman_.deoptimize_block(nb);
5281 goto insert_bit;
5282 }
5283 carry_over = 1;
5284 }
5285 else // BIT block
5286 {
5287 insert_bit:
5288 BM_ASSERT(IS_VALID_ADDR(block));
5289 carry_over = bm::bit_block_insert(block, nbit, value);
5290 }
5291 }
5292 }
5293 ++nb;
5294 }
5295
5296 // 2: shift right everything else
5297 //
5298 unsigned i0, j0;
5299 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i0, j0);
5300
5301 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
5302 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5303 bm::word_t** blk_blk;
5304 bm::word_t* block;
5305
5306 for (unsigned i = i0; i < bm::set_top_array_size; ++i)
5307 {
5308 if (i >= top_blocks)
5309 {
5310 if (!carry_over)
5311 break;
5312 blk_blk = 0;
5313 }
5314 else
5315 blk_blk = blk_root[i];
5316
5317 if (!blk_blk) // top level group of blocks missing - can skip it
5318 {
5319 if (carry_over)
5320 {
5321 // carry over: needs block-list extension and a block
5322 block_idx_type nblock = (block_idx_type(i) * bm::set_sub_array_size) + 0;
5323 if (nblock > nb)
5324 {
5325 block =
5326 blockman_.check_allocate_block(nblock, 0, 0, &block_type, false);
5327 block[0] |= carry_over; // block is brand new (0000)
5328
5329 // reset all control vars (blocks tree may have re-allocated)
5330 blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5331 blk_blk = blk_root[i];
5332 top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
5333
5334 carry_over = 0;
5335 }
5336 }
5337 continue;
5338 }
5339 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5340 {
5341 if (carry_over)
5342 continue;
5343 blk_blk = blockman_.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
5344 }
5345
5346 unsigned j = j0;
5347 do
5348 {
5349 block_idx_type nblock = (block_idx_type(i) * bm::set_sub_array_size) + j;
5350 block = blk_blk[j];
5351 if (!block)
5352 {
5353 if (carry_over)
5354 {
5355 size_type nbit = nblock * bm::gap_max_bits;
5356 set_bit_no_check(nbit);
5357 carry_over = 0; block = 0;
5358 }
5359 // no CO: tight loop scan for the next available block (if any)
5360 for (++j; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
5361 {
5362 if (0 != (block = blk_blk[j]))
5363 {
5364 nblock = (i * bm::set_sub_array_size) + j;
5365 break;
5366 }
5367 } // for j
5368 if (!block) // no more blocks in this j-dimention
5369 continue;
5370 }
5371 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(block))
5372 {
5373 // 1 in 1 out, block is still all 0xFFFF..
5374 // 0 into 1 -> carry in 0, carry out 1
5375 if (!carry_over)
5376 {
5377 block = blockman_.deoptimize_block(nblock);
5378 block[0] <<= (carry_over = 1);
5379 }
5380 continue;
5381 }
5382 if (BM_IS_GAP(block))
5383 {
5384 if (nblock == bm::set_total_blocks-1) // last block
5385 {
5386 // process as a bit-block (for simplicity)
5387 block = blockman_.deoptimize_block(nblock);
5388 }
5389 else // use gap-block shift here
5390 {
5391 unsigned new_block_len;
5392 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(block);
5393
5394 carry_over = bm::gap_shift_r1(gap_blk, carry_over, &new_block_len);
5395 unsigned threshold = bm::gap_limit(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
5396 if (new_block_len > threshold)
5397 blockman_.extend_gap_block(nblock, gap_blk);
5398 continue;
5399 }
5400 }
5401 // bit-block
5402 {
5403 bm::word_t acc;
5404 carry_over = bm::bit_block_shift_r1_unr(block, &acc, carry_over);
5405 BM_ASSERT(carry_over <= 1);
5406
5407 if (nblock == bm::set_total_blocks-1) // last possible block
5408 {
5409 carry_over = block[bm::set_block_size-1] & (1u<<31);
5410 block[bm::set_block_size-1] &= ~(1u<<31); // clear the 1-bit tail
5411 if (!acc) // block shifted out: release memory
5412 blockman_.zero_block(nblock);
5413 break;
5414 }
5415 if (!acc)
5416 blockman_.zero_block(nblock);
5417 }
5418
5419 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
5420 j0 = 0;
5421 } // for i
5422 return carry_over;
5423
5424}
5425
5426//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5427
5428template<class Alloc>
5429void bvector<Alloc>::erase(size_type n)
5430{
5431 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5432 BM_ASSERT_THROW(n < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
5433
5434 if (!blockman_.is_init())
5435 return ;
5436
5437 // calculate logical block number
5438 block_idx_type nb = (n >> bm::set_block_shift);
5439
5440 if (!n ) // regular shift-left by 1 bit
5441 {}
5442 else // process target block bit erase
5443 {
5444 unsigned i, j;
5445 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i, j);
5446 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
5447 bool carry_over = test_first_block_bit(nb+1);
5448 if (!block)
5449 {
5450 if (carry_over)
5451 {
5452 block = blockman_.check_allocate_block(nb, BM_BIT);
5453 block[bm::set_block_size-1] = (1u << 31u);
5454 }
5455 }
5456 else
5457 {
5458 if (BM_IS_GAP(block) || IS_FULL_BLOCK(block))
5459 block = blockman_.deoptimize_block(nb);
5460 BM_ASSERT(IS_VALID_ADDR(block));
5461 unsigned nbit = unsigned(n & bm::set_block_mask);
5462 bm::bit_block_erase(block, nbit, carry_over);
5463 }
5464 ++nb;
5465 }
5466 // left shifting of all other blocks
5467 //
5468 unsigned i0, j0;
5469 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i0, j0);
5470
5471 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
5472 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5473 bm::word_t** blk_blk;
5474 bm::word_t* block;
5475
5476 for (unsigned i = i0; i < bm::set_top_array_size; ++i)
5477 {
5478 if (i >= top_blocks)
5479 break;
5480 else
5481 blk_blk = blk_root[i];
5482
5483 if (!blk_blk) // top level group of blocks missing
5484 {
5485 bool found = bm::find_not_null_ptr(blk_root, i+1, top_blocks, &i);
5486 if (!found)
5487 break;
5488 --i;
5489 continue;
5490 }
5491 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5492 {
5493 bool carry_over = 0;
5494 if (i + 1 < bm::set_top_array_size)
5495 {
5496 size_type co_idx = (block_idx_type(i)+1) * bm::gap_max_bits * bm::set_sub_array_size;
5497 carry_over = this->test(co_idx);
5498 if (carry_over)
5499 continue; // nothing to do (1 in)
5500 else
5501 blk_blk = blockman_.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
5502 }
5503 else
5504 {
5505 blk_blk = blockman_.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
5506 }
5507 }
5508
5509 unsigned j = j0;
5510 do
5511 {
5512 block_idx_type nblock = (block_idx_type(i) * bm::set_sub_array_size) + j;
5513 bool carry_over = 0; // test_first_block_bit(nblock+1); // look ahead for CO
5514 block = blk_blk[j];
5515 if (!block)
5516 {
5517 // no CO: tight loop scan for the next available block (if any)
5518 bool no_blocks = (j == 0);
5519 for (++j; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
5520 {
5521 if (0 != (block = blk_blk[j]))
5522 {
5523 nblock = (block_idx_type(i) * bm::set_sub_array_size) + j;
5524 break;
5525 }
5526 } // for j
5527 if (!block) // no more blocks in this j-dimention ?
5528 {
5529 if (j == bm::set_sub_array_size && no_blocks)
5530 {
5531 blockman_.zero_block(i, j-1); // free the top level
5532 }
5533 continue;
5534 }
5535 }
5536 BM_ASSERT(block);
5537 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(block))
5538 {
5539 carry_over = test_first_block_bit(nblock+1); // look ahead for CO
5540 // 1 in 1 out, block is still all 0xFFFF..
5541 // 0 into 1 -> carry in 0, carry out 1
5542 if (!carry_over)
5543 {
5544 block = blockman_.deoptimize_block(nblock);
5545 block[bm::set_block_size-1] >>= 1;
5546 }
5547 carry_over = 1;
5548 }
5549 else
5550 if (BM_IS_GAP(block))
5551 {
5552 carry_over = test_first_block_bit(nblock+1); // look ahead for CO
5553 unsigned new_block_len;
5554 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(block);
5555
5556 carry_over = bm::gap_shift_l1(gap_blk, carry_over, &new_block_len);
5557 unsigned threshold = bm::gap_limit(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
5558 if (new_block_len > threshold)
5559 blockman_.extend_gap_block(nblock, gap_blk);
5560 else
5561 {
5562 if (bm::gap_is_all_zero(gap_blk))
5563 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
5564 }
5565 }
5566 else // bit-block
5567 {
5568 bm::word_t acc;
5569 carry_over = bm::bit_block_shift_l1_unr(block, &acc, carry_over);
5570 if (!acc)
5571 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
5572 }
5573
5574 if (carry_over && nblock)
5575 {
5576 set_bit_no_check((nblock-1) * bm::gap_max_bits + bm::gap_max_bits-1);
5577 }
5578
5579 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
5580 j0 = 0;
5581 } // for i
5582
5583}
5584
5585//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5586
5587template<class Alloc>
5588bool bvector<Alloc>::test_first_block_bit(block_idx_type nb) const BMNOEXCEPT
5589{
5590 if (nb >= bm::set_total_blocks) // last possible block
5591 return false;
5592 return test(nb * bm::gap_max_bits);
5593}
5594
5595
5596//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5597
5598template<class Alloc>
5599void bvector<Alloc>::merge(bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv)
5600{
5601 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5602
5603 if (!bv.blockman_.is_init()) // nothing to OR
5604 return;
5605
5606 if (bv.is_ro()) // argument is immutable, just use OR
5607 {
5608 this->bit_or(bv);
5609 return;
5610 }
5611
5612 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
5613 if (size_ < bv.size_) // this vect shorter than the arg.
5614 {
5615 size_ = bv.size_;
5616 }
5617 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
5618 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(arg_top_blocks);
5619
5620
5621 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5622 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg = bv.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5623
5624 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
5625 {
5626 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
5627 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg = (i < arg_top_blocks) ? blk_root_arg[i] : 0;
5628 if (blk_blk == blk_blk_arg || !blk_blk_arg) // nothing to do (0 OR 0 == 0)
5629 continue;
5630 if (!blk_blk && blk_blk_arg) // top block transfer
5631 {
5632 BM_ASSERT(i < arg_top_blocks);
5633
5634 blk_root[i] = blk_root_arg[i];
5635 blk_root_arg[i] = 0;
5636 continue;
5637 }
5638 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5639 continue;
5640 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5641 {
5642 blockman_.deallocate_top_subblock(i);
5643 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
5644 continue;
5645 }
5646
5647 unsigned j = 0;
5648 bm::word_t* blk;
5649 bm::word_t* arg_blk;
5650 do
5651 {
5652 blk = blk_blk[j]; arg_blk = blk_blk_arg[j];
5653 if (blk != arg_blk)
5654 {
5655 if (!blk && arg_blk) // block transfer
5656 {
5657 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, arg_blk);
5658 bv.blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
5659 }
5660 else // need full OR
5661 {
5662 combine_operation_block_or(i, j, blk, arg_blk);
5663 }
5664 }
5665 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
5666 } // for i
5667}
5668
5669//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5670
5671template<class Alloc>
5672void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_with_block(block_idx_type nb,
5673 const bm::word_t* arg_blk,
5674 bool arg_gap,
5675 bm::operation opcode)
5676{
5677 unsigned i0, j0;
5678 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i0, j0);
5679 bm::word_t* blk = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i0, j0);
5680
5681 bool gap = BM_IS_GAP(blk);
5682 combine_operation_with_block(nb, gap, blk, arg_blk, arg_gap, opcode);
5683}
5684
5685//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5686
5687template<class Alloc>
5688bm::bvector<Alloc>&
5689bvector<Alloc>::bit_or(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv1,
5690 const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv2,
5691 typename bm::bvector<Alloc>::optmode opt_mode)
5692{
5693 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5694
5695 if (blockman_.is_init())
5696 blockman_.deinit_tree();
5697
5698 if (&bv1 == &bv2)
5699 {
5700 this->bit_or(bv2);
5701 return *this;
5702 }
5703 if (this == &bv1)
5704 {
5705 this->bit_or(bv2);
5706 return *this;
5707 }
5708 if (this == &bv2)
5709 {
5710 this->bit_or(bv1);
5711 return *this;
5712 }
5713
5714 const blocks_manager_type& bman1 = bv1.get_blocks_manager();
5715 const blocks_manager_type& bman2 = bv2.get_blocks_manager();
5716
5717 unsigned top_blocks1 = bman1.top_block_size();
5718 unsigned top_blocks2 = bman2.top_block_size();
5719 unsigned top_blocks = (top_blocks2 > top_blocks1) ? top_blocks2 : top_blocks1;
5720 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
5721
5722 size_ = bv1.size_;
5723 if (size_ < bv2.size_)
5724 size_ = bv2.size_;
5725
5726 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg1 = bv1.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5727 if (!blk_root_arg1)
5728 {
5729 this->bit_or(bv2);
5730 return *this;
5731 }
5732 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg2 = bv2.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5733 if (!blk_root_arg2)
5734 {
5735 this->bit_or(bv1);
5736 return *this;
5737 }
5738
5739 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
5740 {
5741 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg1 = (i < top_blocks1) ? blk_root_arg1[i] : 0;
5742 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg2 = (i < top_blocks2) ? blk_root_arg2[i] : 0;
5743
5744 if (blk_blk_arg1 == blk_blk_arg2)
5745 {
5746 BM_ASSERT(!blk_blk_arg1 || (bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
5747 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5748 blk_root[i] = blk_blk_arg1;
5749 continue;
5750 }
5751 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR ||
5752 (bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg2 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
