5753 {
5754 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5755 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
5756 continue;
5757 }
5758 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blockman_.alloc_top_subblock(i);
5759 bool any_blocks = false;
5760 unsigned j = 0;
5761 do
5762 {
5763 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1 = blk_blk_arg1 ? blk_blk_arg1[j] : 0;
5764 const bm::word_t* arg_blk2 = blk_blk_arg2 ? blk_blk_arg2[j] : 0;
5765 if (arg_blk1 == arg_blk2 && !arg_blk1)
5766 continue;
5767 bool need_opt = combine_operation_block_or(i, j, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
5768 if (need_opt && opt_mode == opt_compress)
5769 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j);
5770 any_blocks |= bool(blk_blk[j]);
5771 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
5772
5773 if (!any_blocks)
5774 blockman_.free_top_subblock(i);
5775
5776 } // for i
5777
5778 if (opt_mode != opt_none)
5779 blockman_.free_temp_block();
5780
5781 return *this;
5782}
5783
5784//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5785
5786template<class Alloc>
5787bm::bvector<Alloc>&
5788bvector<Alloc>::bit_xor(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv1,
5789 const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv2,
5790 typename bm::bvector<Alloc>::optmode opt_mode)
5791{
5792 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5793
5794 if (blockman_.is_init())
5795 blockman_.deinit_tree();
5796
5797 if (&bv1 == &bv2)
5798 return *this; // nothing to do empty result
5799
5800 if (this == &bv1)
5801 {
5802 this->bit_xor(bv2);
5803 return *this;
5804 }
5805 if (this == &bv2)
5806 {
5807 this->bit_xor(bv1);
5808 return *this;
5809 }
5810
5811 const blocks_manager_type& bman1 = bv1.get_blocks_manager();
5812 if (!bman1.is_init())
5813 {
5814 *this = bv2;
5815 return *this;
5816 }
5817 const blocks_manager_type& bman2 = bv2.get_blocks_manager();
5818 if (!bman2.is_init())
5819 {
5820 *this = bv1;
5821 return *this;
5822 }
5823
5824 unsigned top_blocks1 = bman1.top_block_size();
5825 unsigned top_blocks2 = bman2.top_block_size();
5826 unsigned top_blocks = (top_blocks2 > top_blocks1) ? top_blocks2 : top_blocks1;
5827 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
5828
5829 size_ = bv1.size_;
5830 if (size_ < bv2.size_)
5831 size_ = bv2.size_;
5832
5833 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg1 = bv1.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5834 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg2 = bv2.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5835
5836 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
5837 {
5838 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg1 = (i < top_blocks1) ? blk_root_arg1[i] : 0;
5839 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg2 = (i < top_blocks2) ? blk_root_arg2[i] : 0;
5840
5841 if (blk_blk_arg1 == blk_blk_arg2)
5842 {
5843 if (!blk_blk_arg1)
5844 continue;
5845 BM_ASSERT((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
5846 blockman_.deallocate_top_subblock(i);
5847 continue;
5848 }
5849 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5850 {
5851 if (!blk_blk_arg2)
5852 {
5853 set_full_sb:
5854 bm::word_t*** blk_root= blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5855 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
5856 continue;
5857 }
5858 blk_blk_arg1 = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
5859 }
5860 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg2 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5861 {
5862 if (!blk_blk_arg1)
5863 goto set_full_sb;
5864 blk_blk_arg2 = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
5865 }
5866
5867 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blockman_.alloc_top_subblock(i);
5868 bool any_blocks = false;
5869 unsigned j = 0;
5870 do
5871 {
5872 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1; const bm::word_t* arg_blk2;
5873 arg_blk1 = blk_blk_arg1 ? blk_blk_arg1[j] : 0;
5874 arg_blk2 = blk_blk_arg2 ? blk_blk_arg2[j] : 0;
5875
5876 if ((arg_blk1 == arg_blk2) &&
5877 (!arg_blk1 || arg_blk1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR))
5878 continue; // 0 ^ 0 == 0 , 1 ^ 1 == 0 (nothing to do)
5879
5880 bool need_opt = combine_operation_block_xor(i, j, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
5881 if (need_opt && opt_mode == opt_compress)
5882 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j);
5883 any_blocks |= bool(blk_blk[j]);
5884 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
5885
5886 if (!any_blocks)
5887 blockman_.free_top_subblock(i);
5888
5889 } // for i
5890
5891 if (opt_mode != opt_none)
5892 blockman_.free_temp_block();
5893
5894 return *this;
5895}
5896
5897//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5898
5899template<class Alloc>
5900bm::bvector<Alloc>&
5901bvector<Alloc>::bit_and(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv1,
5902 const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv2,
5903 typename bm::bvector<Alloc>::optmode opt_mode)
5904{
5905 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
5906
5907 if (&bv1 == &bv2)
5908 {
5909 *this = bv1;
5910 return *this;
5911 }
5912 if (this == &bv1)
5913 {
5914 this->bit_and(bv2);
5915 return *this;
5916 }
5917 if (this == &bv2)
5918 {
5919 this->bit_and(bv1);
5920 return *this;
5921 }
5922 if (blockman_.is_init())
5923 blockman_.deinit_tree();
5924
5925 const blocks_manager_type& bman1 = bv1.get_blocks_manager();
5926 const blocks_manager_type& bman2 = bv2.get_blocks_manager();
5927 if (!bman1.is_init() || !bman2.is_init())
5928 return *this;
5929
5930 unsigned top_blocks1 = bman1.top_block_size();
5931 unsigned top_blocks2 = bman2.top_block_size();
5932 unsigned top_blocks = (top_blocks2 > top_blocks1) ? top_blocks2 : top_blocks1;
5933 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
5934
5935 size_ = bv1.size_;
5936 if (size_ < bv2.size_)
5937 size_ = bv2.size_;
5938
5939 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg1 = bv1.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5940 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg2 = bv2.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5941
5942 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
5943 {
5944 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg1 = (i < top_blocks1) ? blk_root_arg1[i] : 0;
5945 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg2 = (i < top_blocks2) ? blk_root_arg2[i] : 0;
5946
5947 if (blk_blk_arg1 == blk_blk_arg2)
5948 {
5949 if (!blk_blk_arg1)
5950 continue; // 0 & 0 == 0
5951 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5952 {
5953 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
5954 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
5955 continue;
5956 }
5957 }
5958 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5959 blk_blk_arg1 = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
5960 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg2 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
5961 blk_blk_arg2 = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
5962
5963 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blockman_.alloc_top_subblock(i);
5964 bool any_blocks = false;
5965 unsigned j = 0;
5966 do
5967 {
5968 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1; const bm::word_t* arg_blk2;
5969 arg_blk1 = blk_blk_arg1 ? blk_blk_arg1[j] : 0;
5970 arg_blk2 = blk_blk_arg2 ? blk_blk_arg2[j] : 0;
5971
5972 if ((arg_blk1 == arg_blk2) && !arg_blk1)
5973 continue; // 0 & 0 == 0
5974
5975 bool need_opt = combine_operation_block_and(i, j, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
5976 if (need_opt && opt_mode == opt_compress)
5977 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j);
5978 any_blocks |= bool(blk_blk[j]);
5979 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
5980
5981 if (!any_blocks)
5982 blockman_.free_top_subblock(i);
5983
5984 } // for i
5985
5986 if (opt_mode != opt_none)
5987 blockman_.free_temp_block();
5988
5989 return *this;
5990}
5991
5992//---------------------------------------------------------------------
5993
5994template<class Alloc>
5995bm::bvector<Alloc>&
5996bvector<Alloc>::bit_or_and(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv1,
5997 const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv2,
5998 typename bm::bvector<Alloc>::optmode opt_mode)
5999{
6000 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
6001
6002 if (&bv1 == &bv2)
6003 {
6004 this->bit_or(bv1);
6005 return *this;
6006 }
6007 if (this == &bv1)
6008 {
6009 this->bit_and(bv2);
6010 return *this;
6011 }
6012 if (this == &bv2)
6013 {
6014 this->bit_and(bv1);
6015 return *this;
6016 }
6017
6018 const blocks_manager_type& bman1 = bv1.get_blocks_manager();
6019 const blocks_manager_type& bman2 = bv2.get_blocks_manager();
6020 if (!bman1.is_init() || !bman2.is_init())
6021 return *this;
6022
6023 unsigned top_blocks1 = bman1.top_block_size();
6024 unsigned top_blocks2 = bman2.top_block_size();
6025 unsigned top_blocks = (top_blocks2 > top_blocks1) ? top_blocks2 : top_blocks1;
6026 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
6027
6028 size_type new_size = bv1.size_;
6029 if (new_size < bv2.size_)
6030 new_size = bv2.size_;
6031 if (size_ < new_size)
6032 size_ = new_size;
6033
6034 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg1 = bv1.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6035 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg2 = bv2.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6036
6037 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
6038 {
6039 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg1 = (i < top_blocks1) ? blk_root_arg1[i] : 0;
6040 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg2 = (i < top_blocks2) ? blk_root_arg2[i] : 0;
6041
6042 if (blk_blk_arg1 == blk_blk_arg2)
6043 {
6044 if (!blk_blk_arg1)
6045 continue; // 0 & 0 == 0
6046 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6047 {
6048 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6049 if (blk_root[i])
6050 blockman_.deallocate_top_subblock(i);
6051 BM_ASSERT(!blk_root[i]);
6052 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
6053 continue;
6054 }
6055 }
6056 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6057 blk_blk_arg1 = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
6058 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg2 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6059 blk_blk_arg2 = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
6060
6061 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blockman_.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
6062 bool any_blocks = false;
6063 for (unsigned j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
6064 {
6065 if (blk_blk[j] == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) // saturated: nothing to do
6066 {
6067 any_blocks = true;
6068 continue;
6069 }
6070
6071 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1; const bm::word_t* arg_blk2;
6072 arg_blk1 = blk_blk_arg1 ? blk_blk_arg1[j] : 0;
6073 arg_blk2 = blk_blk_arg2 ? blk_blk_arg2[j] : 0;
6074
6075 if ((arg_blk1 == arg_blk2) && !arg_blk1)
6076 continue; // 0 & 0 == 0
6077
6078 bool need_opt;
6079 if (!blk_blk[j]) // nothing to OR
6080 {
6081 need_opt =
6082 combine_operation_block_and(i, j, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
6083 }
6084 else
6085 {
6086 need_opt =
6087 combine_operation_block_and_or(i, j, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
6088 }
6089 if (need_opt && opt_mode == opt_compress)
6090 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j);
6091
6092 any_blocks |= bool(blk_blk[j]);
6093
6094 } // for j
6095
6096 if (!any_blocks)
6097 blockman_.free_top_subblock(i);
6098
6099 } // for i
6100
6101 if (opt_mode != opt_none)
6102 blockman_.free_temp_block();
6103
6104 return *this;
6105}
6106
6107
6108
6109//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6110
6111template<class Alloc>
6112bm::bvector<Alloc>&
6113bvector<Alloc>::bit_sub(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv1,
6114 const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv2,
6115 typename bm::bvector<Alloc>::optmode opt_mode)
6116{
6117 BM_ASSERT(!is_ro());
6118
6119 if (blockman_.is_init())
6120 blockman_.deinit_tree();
6121
6122 if (&bv1 == &bv2)
6123 return *this; // nothing to do empty result
6124
6125 if (this == &bv1)
6126 {
6127 this->bit_sub(bv2);
6128 return *this;
6129 }
6130 if (this == &bv2)
6131 {
6132 this->bit_sub(bv1);
6133 return *this;
6134 }
6135
6136 const blocks_manager_type& bman1 = bv1.get_blocks_manager();
6137 const blocks_manager_type& bman2 = bv2.get_blocks_manager();
6138 if (!bman1.is_init())
6139 {
6140 return *this;
6141 }
6142 if (!bman2.is_init())
6143 {
6144 this->bit_or(bv1);
6145 return *this;
6146 }
6147
6148 unsigned top_blocks1 = bman1.top_block_size();
6149 unsigned top_blocks2 = bman2.top_block_size();
6150 unsigned top_blocks = (top_blocks2 > top_blocks1) ? top_blocks2 : top_blocks1;
6151 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(top_blocks);
6152
6153 size_ = bv1.size_;
6154 if (size_ < bv2.size_)
6155 size_ = bv2.size_;
6156
6157 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg1 = bv1.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6158 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg2 = bv2.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6159
6160 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
6161 {
6162 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg1 = (i < top_blocks1) ? blk_root_arg1[i] : 0;
6163 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg2 = (i < top_blocks2) ? blk_root_arg2[i] : 0;
6164
6165 if (blk_blk_arg1 == blk_blk_arg2)
6166 continue; // 0 AND NOT 0 == 0
6167 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg2 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6168 continue;
6169 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg1 == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6170 blk_blk_arg1 = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
6171
6172 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blockman_.alloc_top_subblock(i);
6173 bool any_blocks = false;
6174 unsigned j = 0;
6175 do
6176 {
6177 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1 = blk_blk_arg1 ? blk_blk_arg1[j] : 0;
6178 const bm::word_t* arg_blk2 = blk_blk_arg2 ? blk_blk_arg2[j] : 0;
6179 if ((arg_blk1 == arg_blk2) && !arg_blk1)
6180 continue; // 0 & ~0 == 0
6181
6182 bool need_opt = combine_operation_block_sub(i, j, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
6183 if (need_opt && opt_mode == opt_compress)
6184 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j);
6185 any_blocks |= bool(blk_blk[j]);
6186 } while (++j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
6187
6188 if (!any_blocks)
6189 blockman_.free_top_subblock(i);
6190
6191 } // for i
6192
6193 if (opt_mode != opt_none)
6194 blockman_.free_temp_block();
6195
6196 return *this;
6197}
6198
6199
6200//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6201
6202#define BM_OR_OP(x) \
6203 { \
6204 blk = blk_blk[j+x]; arg_blk = blk_blk_arg[j+x]; \
6205 if (blk != arg_blk) \
6206 combine_operation_block_or(i, j+x, blk, arg_blk); \
6207 }
6208
6209template<class Alloc>
6210void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_or(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv)
6211{
6212 if (!bv.blockman_.is_init())
6213 return;
6214
6215 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
6216 if (size_ < bv.size_)
6217 size_ = bv.size_;
6218
6219 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
6220 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(arg_top_blocks);
6221
6222 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6223 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg = bv.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6224
6225 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
6226 {
6227 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
6228 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg = (i < arg_top_blocks) ? blk_root_arg[i] : 0;
6229 if (blk_blk == blk_blk_arg || !blk_blk_arg) // nothing to do (0 OR 0 == 0)
6230 continue;
6231 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6232 continue;
6233 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6234 {
6235 blockman_.deallocate_top_subblock(i);
6236 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**)FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
6237 continue;
6238 }
6239 if (!blk_blk)
6240 blk_blk = blockman_.alloc_top_subblock(i);
6241
6242 unsigned j = 0;
6243 bm::word_t* blk;
6244 const bm::word_t* arg_blk;
6245 do
6246 {
6247 #if defined(BM64_AVX2) || defined(BM64_AVX512)
6248 if (!avx2_test_all_eq_wave2(blk_blk + j, blk_blk_arg + j))
6249 {
6250 BM_OR_OP(0)
6251 BM_OR_OP(1)
6252 BM_OR_OP(2)
6253 BM_OR_OP(3)
6254 }
6255 j += 4;
6256 #elif defined(BM64_SSE4)
6257 if (!sse42_test_all_eq_wave2(blk_blk + j, blk_blk_arg + j))
6258 {
6259 BM_OR_OP(0)
6260 BM_OR_OP(1)
6261 }
6262 j += 2;
6263 #else
6264 BM_OR_OP(0)
6265 ++j;
6266 #endif
6267 } while (j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
6268 } // for i
6269}
6270
6271#undef BM_OR_OP
6272
6273//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6274
6275#define BM_XOR_OP(x) \
6276 { \
6277 blk = blk_blk[j+x]; arg_blk = blk_blk_arg[j+x]; \
6278 combine_operation_block_xor(i, j+x, blk, arg_blk); \
6279 }
6280
6281template<class Alloc>
6282void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_xor(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv)
6283{
6284 if (!bv.blockman_.is_init())
6285 return;
6286 if (!blockman_.is_init())
6287 {
6288 *this = bv;
6289 return;
6290 }
6291
6292 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
6293 if (size_ < bv.size_) // this vect shorter than the arg.
6294 {
6295 size_ = bv.size_;
6296 }
6297 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
6298 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(arg_top_blocks);
6299
6300 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6301 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg = bv.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6302
6303 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
6304 {
6305 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg = (i < arg_top_blocks) ? blk_root_arg[i] : 0;
6306 if (!blk_blk_arg)
6307 continue;
6308 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
6309 if (blk_blk == blk_blk_arg) // nothing to do (any XOR 0 == 0)
6310 {
6311 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6312 blk_root[i] = 0;
6313 continue;
6314 }
6315 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6316 {
6317 if (!blk_blk_arg)
6318 continue;
6319 blk_blk = blockman_.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
6320 }
6321 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6322 {
6323 if (!blk_blk)
6324 {
6325 blk_root[i] = (bm::word_t**) FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR;
6326 continue;
6327 }
6328 blk_blk_arg = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
6329 }
6330
6331 if (!blk_blk)
6332 blk_blk = blockman_.alloc_top_subblock(i);
6333
6334 unsigned j = 0;
6335 bm::word_t* blk;
6336 const bm::word_t* arg_blk;
6337 do
6338 {
6339 #if defined(BM64_AVX2) || defined(BM64_AVX512)
6340 if (!avx2_test_all_zero_wave2(blk_blk + j, blk_blk_arg + j))
6341 {
6342 BM_XOR_OP(0)
6343 BM_XOR_OP(1)
6344 BM_XOR_OP(2)
6345 BM_XOR_OP(3)
6346 }
6347 j += 4;
6348 #elif defined(BM64_SSE4)
6349 if (!sse42_test_all_zero_wave2(blk_blk + j, blk_blk_arg + j))
6350 {
6351 BM_XOR_OP(0)
6352 BM_XOR_OP(1)
6353 }
6354 j += 2;
6355 #else
6356 BM_XOR_OP(0)
6357 ++j;
6358 #endif
6359 } while (j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
6360 } // for i
6361}
6362
6363#undef BM_XOR_OP
6364
6365
6366//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6367
6368#define BM_AND_OP(x) if (0 != (blk = blk_blk[j+x])) \
6369 { \
6370 if (0 != (arg_blk = blk_blk_arg[j+x])) \
6371 { \
6372 combine_operation_block_and(i, j+x, blk, arg_blk); \
6373 if (opt_mode == opt_compress) \
6374 blockman_.optimize_bit_block(i, j+x); \
6375 } \
6376 else \
6377 blockman_.zero_block(i, j+x); \
6378 }
6379
6380template<class Alloc>
6381void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_and(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv,
6382 typename bm::bvector<Alloc>::optmode opt_mode)
6383{
6384 if (!blockman_.is_init())
6385 return; // nothing to do, already empty
6386 if (!bv.blockman_.is_init())
6387 {
6388 clear(true);
6389 return;
6390 }
6391
6392 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
6393 if (size_ < bv.size_) // this vect shorter than the arg.
6394 size_ = bv.size_;
6395
6396 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
6397 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(arg_top_blocks);
6398
6399
6400 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6401 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg = bv.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6402
6403 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
6404 {
6405 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
6406 if (!blk_blk) // nothing to do (0 AND 1 == 0)
6407 continue;
6408 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg = (i < arg_top_blocks) ? blk_root_arg[i] : 0;
6409 if (!blk_blk_arg) // free a whole group of blocks
6410 {
6411 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6412 {
6413 blk_root[i] = 0;
6414 }
6415 else
6416 {
6417 for (unsigned j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
6418 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
6419 blockman_.deallocate_top_subblock(i);
6420 }
6421 continue;
6422 }
6423 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6424 continue; // any & 1 == any
6425
6426 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6427 blk_blk = blockman_.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
6428
6429 unsigned j = 0;
6430 bm::word_t* blk;
6431 const bm::word_t* arg_blk;
6432 do
6433 {
6434 #if defined(BM64_AVX2) || defined(BM64_AVX512)
6435 if (!avx2_test_all_zero_wave(blk_blk + j))
6436 {
6437 BM_AND_OP(0)
6438 BM_AND_OP(1)
6439 BM_AND_OP(2)
6440 BM_AND_OP(3)
6441 }
6442 j += 4;
6443 #elif defined(BM64_SSE4)
6444 if (!sse42_test_all_zero_wave(blk_blk + j))
6445 {
6446 BM_AND_OP(0)
6447 BM_AND_OP(1)
6448 }
6449 j += 2;
6450 #else
6451 BM_AND_OP(0)
6452 ++j;
6453 #endif
6454 } while (j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
6455 } // for i
6456}
6457
6458#undef BM_AND_OP
6459
6460
6461//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6462
6463#define BM_SUB_OP(x) \
6464 if ((0 != (blk = blk_blk[j+x])) && (0 != (arg_blk = blk_blk_arg[j+x]))) \
6465 combine_operation_block_sub(i, j+x, blk, arg_blk);
6466
6467
6468template<class Alloc>
6469void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_sub(const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv)
6470{
6471 if (!blockman_.is_init() || !bv.blockman_.is_init())
6472 return;
6473
6474 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
6475 if (size_ < bv.size_) // this vect shorter than the arg.
6476 size_ = bv.size_;
6477
6478 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
6479 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(arg_top_blocks);
6480
6481 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6482 bm::word_t*** blk_root_arg = bv.blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6483
6484 for (unsigned i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
6485 {
6486 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
6487 bm::word_t** blk_blk_arg = (i < arg_top_blocks) ? blk_root_arg[i] : 0;
6488 if (!blk_blk || !blk_blk_arg) // nothing to do (0 AND NOT 1 == 0)
6489 continue;
6490
6491 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk_arg == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) // zero result
6492 {
6493 blockman_.deallocate_top_subblock(i);
6494 continue;
6495 }
6496 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6497 blk_blk = blockman_.check_alloc_top_subblock(i);
6498
6499 bm::word_t* blk;
6500 const bm::word_t* arg_blk;
6501 unsigned j = 0;
6502 do
6503 {
6504 #if defined(BM64_AVX2) || defined(BM64_AVX512)
6505 if (!avx2_test_all_zero_wave(blk_blk + j))
6506 {
6507 BM_SUB_OP(0)
6508 BM_SUB_OP(1)
6509 BM_SUB_OP(2)
6510 BM_SUB_OP(3)
6511 }
6512 j += 4;
6513 #elif defined(BM64_SSE4)
6514 if (!sse42_test_all_zero_wave(blk_blk + j))
6515 {
6516 BM_SUB_OP(0)
6517 BM_SUB_OP(1)
6518 }
6519 j += 2;
6520 #else
6521 BM_SUB_OP(0)
6522 ++j;
6523 #endif
6524 } while (j < bm::set_sub_array_size);
6525 } // for i
6526}
6527
6528#undef BM_SUB_OP
6529
6530//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6531
6532template<class Alloc>
6533void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation(
6534 const bm::bvector<Alloc>& bv,
6535 bm::operation opcode)
6536{
6537 if (!blockman_.is_init())
6538 {
6539 if (opcode == BM_AND || opcode == BM_SUB)
6540 return;
6541 blockman_.init_tree();
6542 }
6543
6544 unsigned top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
6545 unsigned arg_top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
6546
6547 if (arg_top_blocks > top_blocks)
6548 top_blocks = blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(arg_top_blocks);
6549
6550 if (size_ < bv.size_) // this vect shorter than the arg.
6551 {
6552 size_ = bv.size_;
6553 // stretch our capacity
6554 blockman_.reserve_top_blocks(arg_top_blocks);
6555 top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
6556 }
6557 else
6558 if (size_ > bv.size_) // this vector larger
6559 {
6560 if (opcode == BM_AND) // clear the tail with zeros
6561 {
6562 set_range(bv.size_, size_ - 1, false);
6563 if (arg_top_blocks < top_blocks)
6564 {
6565 // not to scan blocks we already swiped
6566 top_blocks = arg_top_blocks;
6567 }
6568 }
6569 }
6570
6571 bm::word_t*** blk_root = blockman_.top_blocks_root();
6572 unsigned block_idx = 0;
6573 unsigned i, j;
6574
6575 // calculate effective top size to avoid overscan
6576 top_blocks = blockman_.top_block_size();
6577 if (top_blocks < bv.blockman_.top_block_size())
6578 {
6579 if (opcode != BM_AND)
6580 {
6581 top_blocks = bv.blockman_.top_block_size();
6582 }
6583 }
6584
6585 for (i = 0; i < top_blocks; ++i)
6586 {
6587 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
6588 if (blk_blk == 0) // not allocated
6589 {
6590 if (opcode == BM_AND) // 0 AND anything == 0
6591 {
6592 block_idx += bm::set_sub_array_size;
6593 continue;
6594 }
6595 const bm::word_t* const* bvbb = bv.blockman_.get_topblock(i);
6596 if (bvbb == 0) // skip it because 0 OP 0 == 0
6597 {
6598 block_idx += bm::set_sub_array_size;
6599 continue;
6600 }
6601 // 0 - self, non-zero argument
6602 block_idx_type r = i * bm::set_sub_array_size;
6603 for (j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
6604 {
6605 const bm::word_t* arg_blk = bv.blockman_.get_block(i, j);
6606 if (arg_blk )
6607 combine_operation_with_block(r + j,
6608 0, 0,
6609 arg_blk, BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk),
6610 opcode);
6611 } // for j
6612 continue;
6613 }
6614
6615 if (opcode == BM_AND)
6616 {
6617 block_idx_type r = i * bm::set_sub_array_size;
6618 for (j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
6619 {
6620 bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
6621 if (blk)
6622 {
6623 const bm::word_t* arg_blk = bv.blockman_.get_block(i, j);
6624 if (arg_blk)
6625 combine_operation_with_block(r + j,
6626 BM_IS_GAP(blk), blk,
6627 arg_blk, BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk),
6628 opcode);
6629 else
6630 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
6631 }
6632
6633 } // for j
6634 }
6635 else // OR, SUB, XOR
6636 {
6637 block_idx_type r = i * bm::set_sub_array_size;
6638 for (j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j)
6639 {
6640 bm::word_t* blk = blk_blk[j];
6641 const bm::word_t* arg_blk = bv.blockman_.get_block(i, j);
6642 if (arg_blk || blk)
6643 combine_operation_with_block(r + j, BM_IS_GAP(blk), blk,
6644 arg_blk, BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk),
6645 opcode);
6646 } // for j
6647 }
6648 } // for i
6649
6650}
6651
6652//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6653
6654template<class Alloc>
6655bool bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_or(unsigned i,
6656 unsigned j,
6657 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1,
6658 const bm::word_t* arg_blk2)
6659{
6660 bm::gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
6661 if (!arg_blk1)
6662 {
6663 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk2);
6664 return 0;
6665 }
6666 if (!arg_blk2)
6667 {
6668 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk1);
6669 return 0;
6670 }
6671 if ((arg_blk1==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) || (arg_blk2==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR))
6672 {
6673 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
6674 return 0;
6675 }
6676
6677 bool is_gap1 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk1);
6678 bool is_gap2 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk2);
6679
6680 if (is_gap1 | is_gap2) // at least one GAP
6681 {
6682 if (is_gap1 & is_gap2) // both GAPS
6683 {
6684 unsigned res_len;
6685 bm::gap_operation_or(BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1),
6686 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2),
6687 tmp_buf, res_len);
6688 blockman_.clone_gap_block(i, j, tmp_buf, res_len);
6689 return 0;
6690 }
6691 // one GAP one bit block
6692 const bm::word_t* arg_block;
6693 const bm::gap_word_t* arg_gap;
6694 if (is_gap1) // arg1 is GAP -> clone arg2(bit)
6695 {
6696 arg_block = arg_blk2;
6697 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1);
6698 }
6699 else // arg2 is GAP
6700 {
6701 arg_block = arg_blk1;
6702 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2);
6703 }
6704 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_block);
6705 bm::gap_add_to_bitset(block, arg_gap);
6706
6707 return true; // optimization may be needed
6708 }
6709
6710 // 2 bit-blocks
6711 //
6712 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.borrow_tempblock();
6713 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, block);
6714
6715 bool all_one = bm::bit_block_or_2way(block, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
6716 if (all_one)
6717 {
6718 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
6719 blockman_.return_tempblock(block);
6720 return 0;
6721 }
6722 return true;
6723}
6724
6725//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6726
6727template<class Alloc>
6728bool bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_xor(unsigned i,
6729 unsigned j,
6730 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1,
6731 const bm::word_t* arg_blk2)
6732{
6733 bm::gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
6734
6735 if (!arg_blk1)
6736 {
6737 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk2);
6738 return 0;
6739 }
6740 if (!arg_blk2)
6741 {
6742 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk1);
6743 return 0;
6744 }
6745 if (arg_blk1==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6746 {
6747 BM_ASSERT(!IS_FULL_BLOCK(arg_blk2));
6748 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk2, true); // invert
6749 return 0;
6750 }
6751 if (arg_blk2==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6752 {
6753 BM_ASSERT(!IS_FULL_BLOCK(arg_blk1));
6754 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk1, true); // invert
6755 return 0;
6756 }
6757
6758 bool is_gap1 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk1);
6759 bool is_gap2 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk2);
6760
6761 if (is_gap1 | is_gap2) // at least one GAP
6762 {
6763 if (is_gap1 & is_gap2) // both GAPS
6764 {
6765 unsigned res_len;
6766 bm::gap_operation_xor(BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1),
6767 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2),
6768 tmp_buf, res_len);
6769 blockman_.clone_gap_block(i, j, tmp_buf, res_len);
6770 return 0;
6771 }
6772 // one GAP one bit block
6773 const bm::word_t* arg_block;
6774 const bm::gap_word_t* arg_gap;
6775 if (is_gap1) // arg1 is GAP -> clone arg2(bit)
6776 {
6777 arg_block = arg_blk2;
6778 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1);
6779 }
6780 else // arg2 is GAP
6781 {
6782 arg_block = arg_blk1;
6783 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2);
6784 }
6785 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_block);
6786 bm::gap_xor_to_bitset(block, arg_gap);
6787
6788 return true; // optimization may be needed
6789 }
6790
6791 // 2 bit-blocks
6792 //
6793 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.borrow_tempblock();
6794 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, block);
6795
6796 bm::id64_t or_mask = bm::bit_block_xor_2way(block, arg_blk1, arg_blk2);
6797 if (!or_mask)
6798 {
6799 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
6800 blockman_.return_tempblock(block);
6801 return 0;
6802 }
6803
6804 return true;
6805}
6806
6807//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6808
6809template<class Alloc>
6810bool bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_and(unsigned i,
6811 unsigned j,
6812 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1,
6813 const bm::word_t* arg_blk2)
6814{
6815 bm::gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
6816
6817 if (!arg_blk1 || !arg_blk2)
6818 return 0;
6819 if ((arg_blk1==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) && (arg_blk2==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR))
6820 {
6821 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
6822 return 0;
6823 }
6824 if (arg_blk1==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6825 {
6826 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk2);
6827 return 0;
6828 }
6829 if (arg_blk2==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6830 {
6831 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk1);
6832 return 0;
6833 }
6834
6835 bool is_gap1 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk1);
6836 bool is_gap2 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk2);
6837
6838 if (is_gap1 | is_gap2) // at least one GAP
6839 {
6840 if (is_gap1 & is_gap2) // both GAPS
6841 {
6842 unsigned res_len;
6843 bm::gap_operation_and(BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1),
6844 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2),
6845 tmp_buf, res_len);
6846 blockman_.clone_gap_block(i, j, tmp_buf, res_len);
6847 return 0;
6848 }
6849 // one GAP one bit block
6850 const bm::word_t* arg_block;
6851 const bm::gap_word_t* arg_gap;
6852 if (is_gap1) // arg1 is GAP -> clone arg2(bit)
6853 {
6854 arg_block = arg_blk2;
6855 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1);
6856 }
6857 else // arg2 is GAP
6858 {
6859 arg_block = arg_blk1;
6860 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2);
6861 }
6862 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_block);
6863 bm::gap_and_to_bitset(block, arg_gap);
6864
6865 bool all_z = bm::bit_is_all_zero(block); // maybe ALL empty block?
6866 if (all_z)
6867 {
6868 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
6869 blockman_.return_tempblock(block);
6870 return false;
6871 }
6872
6873 return true; // optimization may be needed
6874 }
6875
6876 // 2 bit-blocks
6877 //
6878 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.borrow_tempblock();
6879 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, block);
6880
6881 bm::id64_t digest = bm::bit_block_and_2way(block, arg_blk1, arg_blk2, ~0ull);
6882 if (!digest)
6883 {
6884 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
6885 blockman_.return_tempblock(block);
6886 return 0;
6887 }
6888
6889 return true;
6890}
6891
6892//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6893
6894template<class Alloc>
6895bool bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_and_or(unsigned i,
6896 unsigned j,
6897 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1,
6898 const bm::word_t* arg_blk2)
6899{
6900 bm::gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
6901 bm::word_t* blk = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
6902 BM_ASSERT(blk); // target block MUST be allocated
6903
6904 if (!arg_blk1 || !arg_blk2)
6905 return 0;
6906 if ((arg_blk1==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR) && (arg_blk2==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR))
6907 {
6908 if (blk)
6909 blockman_.zero_block(i, j); // free target block and assign FULL
6910 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
6911 return 0;
6912 }
6913 if (arg_blk1==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6914 {
6915 combine_operation_block_or(i, j, blk, arg_blk2);
6916 return 0;
6917 }
6918 if (arg_blk2==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
6919 {
6920 combine_operation_block_or(i, j, blk, arg_blk1);
6921 return 0;
6922 }
6923
6924 blk = blockman_.deoptimize_block_no_check(blk, i, j);
6925
6926 bool is_gap1 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk1);
6927 bool is_gap2 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk2);
6928
6929 if (is_gap1 | is_gap2) // at least one GAP
6930 {
6931 if (is_gap1 & is_gap2) // both GAPS
6932 {
6933 unsigned res_len;
6934 bm::gap_operation_and(BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1), BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2),
6935 tmp_buf, res_len);
6936 bm::gap_add_to_bitset(blk, tmp_buf, res_len);
6937 bool all_one = bm::is_bits_one((bm::wordop_t*) blk);
6938 if (all_one)
6939 {
6940 blockman_.return_tempblock(blk);
6941 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
6942 return false;
6943 }
6944 return true;
6945 }
6946 // one GAP, one bit
6947 const bm::word_t* arg_block;
6948 const bm::gap_word_t* arg_gap;
6949 if (is_gap1) // arg1 is GAP -> clone arg2(bit)
6950 {
6951 arg_block = arg_blk2;
6952 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1);
6953 }
6954 else // arg2 is GAP
6955 {
6956 arg_block = arg_blk1;
6957 arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2);
6958 }
6959 bm::word_t* tmp_blk = blockman_.check_allocate_tempblock();
6960 bm::bit_block_copy(tmp_blk, arg_block);
6961 bm::gap_and_to_bitset(tmp_blk, arg_gap); // bit := bit AND gap
6962 bool all_one = bm::bit_block_or(blk, tmp_blk); // target |= bit
6963 if (all_one)
6964 {
6965 BM_ASSERT(bm::is_bits_one((bm::wordop_t*) blk));
6966 blockman_.return_tempblock(blk);
6967 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
6968 return false;
6969 }
6970 return true; // optimization may be needed
6971 }
6972
6973 // 1+2 bit-blocks
6974 //
6975 bm::id64_t digest_and = ~0ull;
6976 bm::id64_t digest =
6977 bm::bit_block_and_or_2way(blk, arg_blk1, arg_blk2, digest_and);
6978 if (digest == digest_and)
6979 {
6980 bool all_one = bm::is_bits_one((bm::wordop_t*) blk);
6981 if (all_one)
6982 {
6983 blockman_.return_tempblock(blk);
6984 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
6985 return false;
6986 }
6987 }
6988 return true; // optimization may be needed
6989}
6990
6991
6992//---------------------------------------------------------------------
6993
6994template<class Alloc>
6995bool bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_sub(unsigned i,
6996 unsigned j,
6997 const bm::word_t* arg_blk1,
6998 const bm::word_t* arg_blk2)
6999{
7000 bm::gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
7001
7002 if (!arg_blk1)
7003 return 0;
7004 if (!arg_blk2)
7005 {
7006 blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk1);
7007 return 0;
7008 }
7009 if (arg_blk2==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
7010 return 0;
7011 if (arg_blk1==FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
7012 arg_blk1 = FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
7013
7014 bool is_gap1 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk1);
7015 bool is_gap2 = BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk2);
7016
7017 if (is_gap1 | is_gap2) // at least one GAP
7018 {
7019 if (is_gap1 & is_gap2) // both GAPS
7020 {
7021 unsigned res_len;
7022 bm::gap_operation_sub(BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1),
7023 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2),
7024 tmp_buf, res_len);
7025 blockman_.clone_gap_block(i, j, tmp_buf, res_len);
7026 return 0;
7027 }
7028
7029 if (is_gap1)
7030 {
7031 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.borrow_tempblock();
7032 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, block);
7033 bm::gap_convert_to_bitset(block, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk1));
7034 bm::id64_t acc = bm::bit_block_sub(block, arg_blk2);
7035 if (!acc)
7036 {
7037 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
7038 blockman_.return_tempblock(block);
7039 return 0;
7040 }
7041 return true;
7042 }
7043 BM_ASSERT(is_gap2);
7044 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.clone_assign_block(i, j, arg_blk1);
7045 bm::gap_sub_to_bitset(block, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk2));
7046
7047 return true; // optimization may be needed
7048 }
7049
7050 // 2 bit-blocks:
7051 //
7052 bm::word_t* block = blockman_.borrow_tempblock();
7053 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, block);
7054
7055 bm::id64_t digest = bm::bit_block_sub_2way(block, arg_blk1, arg_blk2, ~0ull);
7056 if (!digest)
7057 {
7058 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
7059 blockman_.return_tempblock(block);
7060 return 0;
7061 }
7062 return true;
7063}
7064
7065
7066//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7067
7068template<class Alloc>
7069void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_or(
7070 unsigned i, unsigned j,
7071 bm::word_t* blk, const bm::word_t* arg_blk)
7072{
7073 bm::gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
7074 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk) || !arg_blk) // all bits are set
7075 return; // nothing to do
7076
7077 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(arg_blk))
7078 {
7079 if (blk)
7080 blockman_.zero_block(i, j); // free target block and assign FULL
7081 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
7082 return;
7083 }
7084
7085 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk)) // our block GAP-type
7086 {
7087 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
7088 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // both blocks GAP-type
7089 {
7090 const bm::gap_word_t* res; unsigned res_len;
7091 res = bm::gap_operation_or(gap_blk, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk),
7092 tmp_buf, res_len);
7093 BM_ASSERT(res == tmp_buf);
7094 blockman_.assign_gap_check(i, j, res, ++res_len, blk, tmp_buf);
7095 return;
7096 }
7097 // GAP or BIT
7098 //
7099 bm::word_t* new_blk = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7100 bm::bit_block_copy(new_blk, arg_blk);
7101 bm::gap_add_to_bitset(new_blk, gap_blk);
7102
7103 blockman_.get_allocator().free_gap_block(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
7104 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, new_blk);
7105
7106 return;
7107 }
7108 else // our block is BITSET-type (but NOT FULL_BLOCK we checked it)
7109 {
7110 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // argument block is GAP-type
7111 {
7112 const bm::gap_word_t* arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk);
7113 if (!blk)
7114 {
7115 bool gap = true;
7116 blk = blockman_.clone_gap_block(arg_gap, gap);
7117 blockman_.set_block(i, j, blk, gap);
7118 return;
7119 }
7120
7121 // BIT & GAP
7122 bm::gap_add_to_bitset(blk, arg_gap);
7123 return;
7124 } // if arg_gap
7125 }
7126
7127 if (!blk)
7128 {
7129 blk = blockman_.alloc_.alloc_bit_block();
7130 bm::bit_block_copy(blk, arg_blk);
7131 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, blk);
7132 return;
7133 }
7134
7135 bool all_one = bm::bit_block_or(blk, arg_blk);
7136 if (all_one)
7137 {
7138 BM_ASSERT(bm::is_bits_one((bm::wordop_t*) blk));
7139 blockman_.get_allocator().free_bit_block(blk);
7140 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
7141 }
7142
7143}
7144
7145//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7146
7147template<class Alloc>
7148void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_xor(
7149 unsigned i, unsigned j,
7150 bm::word_t* blk, const bm::word_t* arg_blk)
7151{
7152 bm::gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
7153 if (!arg_blk) // all bits are set
7154 return; // nothing to do
7155
7156 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(arg_blk))
7157 {
7158 if (blk)
7159 {
7160 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk))
7161 bm::gap_invert(BMGAP_PTR(blk));
7162 else
7163 {
7164 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk)) // 1 xor 1 = 0
7165 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
7166 else
7167 bm::bit_invert((wordop_t*) blk);
7168 }
7169 }
7170 else // blk == 0
7171 {
7172 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR);
7173 }
7174 return;
7175 }
7176 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk))
7177 {
7178 if (!arg_blk)
7179 return;
7180 // deoptimize block
7181 blk = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7182 bm::bit_block_set(blk, ~0u);
7183 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, blk);
7184 }
7185
7186
7187 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk)) // our block GAP-type
7188 {
7189 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
7190 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // both blocks GAP-type
7191 {
7192 const bm::gap_word_t* res;
7193 unsigned res_len;
7194 res = bm::gap_operation_xor(gap_blk,
7195 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk),
7196 tmp_buf,
7197 res_len);
7198 BM_ASSERT(res == tmp_buf);
7199 blockman_.assign_gap_check(i, j, res, ++res_len, blk, tmp_buf);
7200 return;
7201 }
7202 // GAP or BIT
7203 //
7204 bm::word_t* new_blk = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7205 bm::bit_block_copy(new_blk, arg_blk);
7206 bm::gap_xor_to_bitset(new_blk, gap_blk);
7207
7208 blockman_.get_allocator().free_gap_block(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
7209 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, new_blk);
7210
7211 return;
7212 }
7213 else // our block is BITSET-type (but NOT FULL_BLOCK we checked it)
7214 {
7215 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // argument block is GAP-type
7216 {
7217 const bm::gap_word_t* arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk);
7218 if (!blk)
7219 {
7220 bool gap = true;
7221 blk = blockman_.clone_gap_block(arg_gap, gap);
7222 blockman_.set_block(i, j, blk, gap);
7223 return;
7224 }
7225 // BIT & GAP
7226 bm::gap_xor_to_bitset(blk, arg_gap);
7227 return;
7228 } // if arg_gap
7229 }
7230
7231 if (!blk)
7232 {
7233 blk = blockman_.alloc_.alloc_bit_block();
7234 bm::bit_block_copy(blk, arg_blk);
7235 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, blk);
7236 return;
7237 }
7238
7239 auto any_bits = bm::bit_block_xor(blk, arg_blk);
7240 if (!any_bits)
7241 {
7242 blockman_.get_allocator().free_bit_block(blk);
7243 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
7244 }
7245}
7246
7247
7248//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7249
7250
7251template<class Alloc>
7252void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_and(
7253 unsigned i, unsigned j, bm::word_t* blk, const bm::word_t* arg_blk)
7254{
7255 BM_ASSERT(arg_blk && blk);
7256
7257 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(arg_blk))
7258 return; // nothing to do
7259
7260 gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
7261
7262 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk)) // our block GAP-type
7263 {
7264 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
7265 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // both blocks GAP-type
7266 {
7267 const bm::gap_word_t* res;
7268 unsigned res_len;
7269 res = bm::gap_operation_and(gap_blk,
7270 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk),
7271 tmp_buf,
7272 res_len);
7273 BM_ASSERT(res == tmp_buf);
7274 blockman_.assign_gap_check(i, j, res, ++res_len, blk, tmp_buf);
7275 return;
7276 }
7277 // GAP & BIT
7278 //
7279 bm::word_t* new_blk = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7280 bm::bit_block_copy(new_blk, arg_blk); // TODO: copy+digest in one pass
7281 bm::id64_t d0 = bm::calc_block_digest0(new_blk);
7282
7283 bm::gap_and_to_bitset(new_blk, gap_blk, d0);
7284
7285 bm::id64_t d0_1 = bm::update_block_digest0(new_blk, d0);
7286 BM_ASSERT(bm::word_bitcount64(d0_1) <= bm::word_bitcount64(d0));
7287 if (!d0_1)
7288 {
7289 BM_ASSERT(bm::bit_is_all_zero(new_blk));
7290 blockman_.get_allocator().free_bit_block(new_blk);
7291 new_blk = 0;
7292 }
7293 else
7294 {
7295 BM_ASSERT(!bm::bit_is_all_zero(new_blk));
7296 }
7297 blockman_.get_allocator().free_gap_block(gap_blk, blockman_.glen());
7298 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, new_blk);
7299
7300 return;
7301 }
7302 else // our block is BITSET-type or FULL_BLOCK
7303 {
7304 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // argument block is GAP-type
7305 {
7306 const bm::gap_word_t* arg_gap = BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk);
7307 if (bm::gap_is_all_zero(arg_gap))
7308 {
7309 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
7310 return;
7311 }
7312 // FULL & GAP is common when AND with set_range() mask
7313 //
7314 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk)) // FULL & gap = gap
7315 {
7316 bool is_new_gap;
7317 bm::word_t* new_blk = blockman_.clone_gap_block(arg_gap, is_new_gap);
7318 if (is_new_gap)
7319 BMSET_PTRGAP(new_blk);
7320
7321 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, new_blk);
7322
7323 return;
7324 }
7325 // BIT & GAP
7326 bm::gap_and_to_bitset(blk, arg_gap);
7327 bool empty = bm::bit_is_all_zero(blk);
7328 if (empty) // operation converged bit-block to empty
7329 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
7330
7331 return;
7332 } // if arg_gap
7333 }
7334
7335 // FULL & bit is common when AND with set_range() mask
7336 //
7337 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk)) // FULL & bit = bit
7338 {
7339 bm::word_t* new_blk = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7340 bm::bit_block_copy(new_blk, arg_blk);
7341 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, new_blk);
7342
7343 return;
7344 }
7345 auto any_bits = bm::bit_block_and(blk, arg_blk);
7346 if (!any_bits)
7347 {
7348 blockman_.get_allocator().free_bit_block(blk);
7349 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, 0);
7350 }
7351}
7352
7353//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7354
7355template<class Alloc>
7356void bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_block_sub(
7357 unsigned i, unsigned j, bm::word_t* blk, const bm::word_t* arg_blk)
7358{
7359 BM_ASSERT(arg_blk && blk);
7360
7361 if (IS_FULL_BLOCK(arg_blk))
7362 {
7363 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
7364 return;
7365 }
7366
7367 gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
7368
7369 if (BM_IS_GAP(blk)) // our block GAP-type
7370 {
7371 bm::gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
7372 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // both blocks GAP-type
7373 {
7374 const bm::gap_word_t* res;
7375 unsigned res_len;
7376 res = bm::gap_operation_sub(gap_blk,
7377 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk),
7378 tmp_buf,
7379 res_len);
7380
7381 BM_ASSERT(res == tmp_buf);
7382 BM_ASSERT(!(res == tmp_buf && res_len == 0));
7383
7384 blockman_.assign_gap_check(i, j, res, ++res_len, blk, tmp_buf);
7385 return;
7386 }
7387 // else: argument is BITSET-type (own block is GAP)
7388 blk = blockman_.convert_gap2bitset(i, j, gap_blk);
7389 // fall through to bit-block to bit-block operation
7390 }
7391 else // our block is BITSET-type or FULL_BLOCK
7392 {
7393 if (BM_IS_GAP(arg_blk)) // argument block is GAP-type
7394 {
7395 if (!IS_FULL_BLOCK(blk)) // gap combined to bitset
7396 {
7397 bm::gap_sub_to_bitset(blk, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk));
7398 bool empty = bm::bit_is_all_zero(blk);
7399 if (empty) // operation converged bit-block to empty
7400 blockman_.zero_block(i, j);
7401 return;
7402 }
7403 // the worst case: convert arg block to bitset
7404 arg_blk =
7405 gap_convert_to_bitset_smart(blockman_.check_allocate_tempblock(),
7406 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk),
7407 bm::gap_max_bits);
7408 }
7409 }
7410
7411 // Now here we combine two plain bitblocks using supplied bit function.
7412 bm::word_t* dst = blk;
7413
7414 bm::word_t* ret;
7415 if (!dst || !arg_blk)
7416 return;
7417
7418 ret = bm::bit_operation_sub(dst, arg_blk);
7419 if (ret && ret == arg_blk)
7420 {
7421 ret = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7422 bm::bit_andnot_arr_ffmask(ret, arg_blk);
7423 }
7424
7425 if (ret != dst) // block mutation
7426 {
7427 blockman_.set_block_ptr(i, j, ret);
7428 if (IS_VALID_ADDR(dst))
7429 blockman_.get_allocator().free_bit_block(dst);
7430 }
7431}
7432
7433//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7434
7435template<class Alloc>
7436void
7437bvector<Alloc>::combine_operation_with_block(block_idx_type nb,
7438 bool gap,
7439 bm::word_t* blk,
7440 const bm::word_t* arg_blk,
7441 bool arg_gap,
7442 bm::operation opcode)
7443{
7444 gap_word_t tmp_buf[bm::gap_equiv_len * 3]; // temporary result
7445 const bm::gap_word_t* res;
7446 unsigned res_len;
7447
7448 if (opcode == BM_OR || opcode == BM_XOR)
7449 {
7450 if (!blk && arg_gap)
7451 {
7452 blk = blockman_.clone_gap_block(BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk), gap);
7453 blockman_.set_block(nb, blk, gap);
7454 return;
7455 }
7456 }
7457
7458 if (gap) // our block GAP-type
7459 {
7460 if (arg_gap) // both blocks GAP-type
7461 {
7462 {
7463 gap_operation_func_type gfunc =
7464 operation_functions<true>::gap_operation(opcode);
7465 BM_ASSERT(gfunc);
7466 res = (*gfunc)(BMGAP_PTR(blk),
7467 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk),
7468 tmp_buf,
7469 res_len);
7470 }
7471 BM_ASSERT(res == tmp_buf);
7472 BM_ASSERT(!(res == tmp_buf && res_len == 0));
7473
7474 // if as a result of the operation gap block turned to zero
7475 // we can now replace it with NULL
7476 if (bm::gap_is_all_zero(res))
7477 blockman_.zero_block(nb);
7478 else
7479 blockman_.assign_gap(nb, res, ++res_len, blk, tmp_buf);
7480 return;
7481 }
7482 else // argument is BITSET-type (own block is GAP)
7483 {
7484 // since we can not combine blocks of mixed type
7485 // we need to convert our block to bitset
7486
7487 if (arg_blk == 0) // Combining against an empty block
7488 {
7489 switch (opcode)
7490 {
7491 case BM_AND: // ("Value" AND 0) == 0
7492 blockman_.zero_block(nb);
7493 return;
7494 case BM_OR: case BM_SUB: case BM_XOR:
7495 return; // nothing to do
7496 default:
7497 return; // nothing to do
7498 }
7499 }
7500 gap_word_t* gap_blk = BMGAP_PTR(blk);
7501 blk = blockman_.convert_gap2bitset(nb, gap_blk);
7502 }
7503 }
7504 else // our block is BITSET-type
7505 {
7506 if (arg_gap) // argument block is GAP-type
7507 {
7508 if (IS_VALID_ADDR(blk))
7509 {
7510 // special case, maybe we can do the job without
7511 // converting the GAP argument to bitblock
7512 gap_operation_to_bitset_func_type gfunc =
7513 bm::operation_functions<true>::gap_op_to_bit(opcode);
7514 BM_ASSERT(gfunc);
7515 (*gfunc)(blk, BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk));
7516
7517 // TODO: commented out optimization, because it can be very slow
7518 // need to take into account previous operation not to make
7519 // fruitless attempts here
7520 //blockman_.optimize_bit_block(nb);
7521 return;
7522 }
7523
7524 // the worst case we need to convert argument block to
7525 // bitset type.
7526 gap_word_t* temp_blk = (gap_word_t*) blockman_.check_allocate_tempblock();
7527 arg_blk =
7528 gap_convert_to_bitset_smart((bm::word_t*)temp_blk,
7529 BMGAP_PTR(arg_blk),
7530 bm::gap_max_bits);
7531 }
7532 }
7533
7534 // Now here we combine two plain bitblocks using supplied bit function.
7535 bm::word_t* dst = blk;
7536
7537 bm::word_t* ret;
7538 if (dst == 0 && arg_blk == 0)
7539 return;
7540
7541 switch (opcode)
7542 {
7543 case BM_AND:
7544 ret = bm::bit_operation_and(dst, arg_blk);
7545 goto copy_block;
7546 case BM_XOR:
7547 ret = bm::bit_operation_xor(dst, arg_blk);
7548 if (ret && (ret == arg_blk) && IS_FULL_BLOCK(dst))
7549 {
7550 ret = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7551#ifdef BMVECTOPT
7552 VECT_XOR_ARR_2_MASK(ret,
7553 arg_blk,
7554 arg_blk + bm::set_block_size,
7555 ~0u);
7556#else
7557 bm::wordop_t* dst_ptr = (wordop_t*)ret;
7558 const bm::wordop_t* wrd_ptr = (wordop_t*) arg_blk;
7559 const bm::wordop_t* wrd_end =
7560 (wordop_t*) (arg_blk + bm::set_block_size);
7561
7562 do
7563 {
7564 dst_ptr[0] = bm::all_bits_mask ^ wrd_ptr[0];
7565 dst_ptr[1] = bm::all_bits_mask ^ wrd_ptr[1];
7566 dst_ptr[2] = bm::all_bits_mask ^ wrd_ptr[2];
7567 dst_ptr[3] = bm::all_bits_mask ^ wrd_ptr[3];
7568
7569 dst_ptr+=4;
7570 wrd_ptr+=4;
7571
7572 } while (wrd_ptr < wrd_end);
7573#endif
7574 break;
7575 }
7576 goto copy_block;
7577 case BM_OR:
7578 ret = bm::bit_operation_or(dst, arg_blk);
7579 copy_block:
7580 if (ret && (ret == arg_blk) && !IS_FULL_BLOCK(ret))
7581 {
7582 ret = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7583 bm::bit_block_copy(ret, arg_blk);
7584 }
7585 break;
7586
7587 case BM_SUB:
7588 ret = bit_operation_sub(dst, arg_blk);
7589 if (ret && ret == arg_blk)
7590 {
7591 ret = blockman_.get_allocator().alloc_bit_block();
7592 bm::bit_andnot_arr_ffmask(ret, arg_blk);
7593 }
7594 break;
7595 default:
7596 BM_ASSERT(0);
7597 ret = 0;
7598 }
7599
7600 if (ret != dst) // block mutation
7601 {
7602 blockman_.set_block(nb, ret);
7603 if (IS_VALID_ADDR(dst))
7604 {
7605 blockman_.get_allocator().free_bit_block(dst);
7606 }
7607 }
7608}
7609
7610//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7611
7612template<class Alloc>
7613void bvector<Alloc>::set_range_no_check(size_type left,
7614 size_type right)
7615{
7616 block_idx_type nblock_left = left >> bm::set_block_shift;
7617 block_idx_type nblock_right = right >> bm::set_block_shift;
7618
7619 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
7620
7621 unsigned r =
7622 (nblock_left == nblock_right) ? nbit_right :(bm::bits_in_block-1);
7623
7624 bm::gap_word_t tmp_gap_blk[5];
7625 tmp_gap_blk[0] = 0; // just to silence GCC warning on uninit var
7626
7627 // Set bits in the starting block
7628 //
7629 block_idx_type nb;
7630 unsigned i, j;
7631 bm::word_t* block;
7632 unsigned nbit_left = unsigned(left & bm::set_block_mask);
7633 if ((nbit_left == 0) && (r == bm::bits_in_block - 1)) // full block
7634 {
7635 nb = nblock_left;
7636 }
7637 else
7638 {
7639 gap_init_range_block<gap_word_t>(tmp_gap_blk,
7640 (gap_word_t)nbit_left,
7641 (gap_word_t)r,
7642 (gap_word_t)1);
7643 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i, j);
7644 block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
7645 combine_operation_with_block(nblock_left,
7646 BM_IS_GAP(block),
7647 block,
7648 (bm::word_t*) tmp_gap_blk,
7649 1, BM_OR);
7650
7651 if (nblock_left == nblock_right) // in one block
7652 return;
7653 nb = nblock_left+1;
7654 }
7655
7656 // Set all full blocks between left and right
7657 //
7658 block_idx_type nb_to = nblock_right + (nbit_right ==(bm::bits_in_block-1));
7659 BM_ASSERT(nb_to >= nblock_right);
7660 if (nb < nb_to)
7661 {
7662 BM_ASSERT(nb_to);
7663 blockman_.set_all_set(nb, nb_to-1);
7664 }
7665
7666 if (nb_to > nblock_right)
7667 return;
7668
7669 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i, j);
7670 block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
7671
7672 gap_init_range_block<gap_word_t>(tmp_gap_blk,
7673 (gap_word_t)0,
7674 (gap_word_t)nbit_right,
7675 (gap_word_t)1);
7676
7677 combine_operation_with_block(nblock_right,
7678 BM_IS_GAP(block),
7679 block,
7680 (bm::word_t*) tmp_gap_blk,
7681 1, BM_OR);
7682}
7683
7684//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7685
7686template<class Alloc>
7687void bvector<Alloc>::clear_range_no_check(size_type left,
7688 size_type right)
7689{
7690 block_idx_type nb;
7691 unsigned i, j;
7692
7693 // calculate logical number of start and destination blocks
7694 block_idx_type nblock_left = left >> bm::set_block_shift;
7695 block_idx_type nblock_right = right >> bm::set_block_shift;
7696
7697 unsigned nbit_right = unsigned(right & bm::set_block_mask);
7698 unsigned r =
7699 (nblock_left == nblock_right) ? nbit_right : (bm::bits_in_block - 1);
7700
7701 bm::gap_word_t tmp_gap_blk[5];
7702 tmp_gap_blk[0] = 0; // just to silence GCC warning on uninit var
7703
7704 // Set bits in the starting block
7705 bm::word_t* block;
7706
7707 unsigned nbit_left = unsigned(left & bm::set_block_mask);
7708 if ((nbit_left == 0) && (r == bm::bits_in_block - 1)) // full block
7709 {
7710 nb = nblock_left;
7711 }
7712 else
7713 {
7714 bm::gap_init_range_block<gap_word_t>(tmp_gap_blk,
7715 (gap_word_t)nbit_left,
7716 (gap_word_t)r,
7717 (gap_word_t)0);
7718 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_left, i, j);
7719 block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
7720 combine_operation_with_block(nblock_left,
7721 BM_IS_GAP(block),
7722 block,
7723 (bm::word_t*) tmp_gap_blk,
7724 1,
7725 BM_AND);
7726
7727 if (nblock_left == nblock_right) // in one block
7728 return;
7729 nb = nblock_left + 1;
7730 }
7731
7732 // Clear all full blocks between left and right
7733
7734 block_idx_type nb_to = nblock_right + (nbit_right == (bm::bits_in_block - 1));
7735 BM_ASSERT(nb_to >= nblock_right);
7736 if (nb < nb_to)
7737 {
7738 BM_ASSERT(nb_to);
7739 blockman_.set_all_zero(nb, nb_to - 1u);
7740 }
7741
7742 if (nb_to > nblock_right)
7743 return;
7744
7745 bm::get_block_coord(nblock_right, i, j);
7746 block = blockman_.get_block_ptr(i, j);
7747 gap_init_range_block<gap_word_t>(tmp_gap_blk,
7748 (gap_word_t)0,
7749 (gap_word_t)nbit_right,
7750 (gap_word_t)0);
7751
7752 combine_operation_with_block(nblock_right,
7753 BM_IS_GAP(block),
7754 block,
7755 (bm::word_t*) tmp_gap_blk,
7756 1,
7757 BM_AND);
7758}
7759
7760
7761//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7762
7763template<class Alloc>
7764void bvector<Alloc>::copy_range(const bvector<Alloc>& bvect,
7765 size_type left,
7766 size_type right)
7767{
7768 if (!bvect.blockman_.is_init())
7769 {
7770 clear();
7771 return;
7772 }
7773
7774 if (blockman_.is_init())
7775 {
7776 blockman_.deinit_tree();
7777 }
7778 if (left > right)
7779 bm::xor_swap(left, right);
7780
7781 copy_range_no_check(bvect, left, right);
7782}
7783
7784//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7785
7786template<class Alloc>
7787void bvector<Alloc>::keep_range_no_check(size_type left, size_type right)
7788{
7789 BM_ASSERT(left <= right);
7790 BM_ASSERT_THROW(right < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
7791
7792 if (left)
7793 {
7794 clear_range_no_check(0, left - 1); // TODO: optimize clear from
7795 }
7796 if (right < bm::id_max - 1)
7797 {
7798 size_type last;
7799 bool found = find_reverse(last);
7800 if (found && (last > right))
7801 clear_range_no_check(right + 1, last);
7802 }
7803 BM_ASSERT(count() == count_range(left, right));
7804}
7805
7806//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7807
7808template<class Alloc>
7809void bvector<Alloc>::copy_range_no_check(const bvector<Alloc>& bvect,
7810 size_type left,
7811 size_type right)
7812{
7813 BM_ASSERT(left <= right);
7814 BM_ASSERT_THROW(right < bm::id_max, BM_ERR_RANGE);
7815
7816 // copy all block(s) belonging to our range
7817 block_idx_type nblock_left = (left >> bm::set_block_shift);
7818 block_idx_type nblock_right = (right >> bm::set_block_shift);
7819
7820 blockman_.copy(bvect.blockman_, nblock_left, nblock_right);
7821
7822 if (left)
7823 {
7824 size_type from =
7825 (left < bm::gap_max_bits) ? 0 : (left - bm::gap_max_bits);
7826 clear_range_no_check(from, left-1); // TODO: optimize clear from
7827 }
7828 if (right < bm::id_max-1)
7829 {
7830 size_type last;
7831 bool found = find_reverse(last);
7832 if (found && (last > right))
7833 clear_range_no_check(right+1, last);
7834 }
7835 //keep_range_no_check(left, right); // clear the flanks
7836}
7837
7838//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7839
7840template<class Alloc>
7841void bvector<Alloc>::freeze()
7842{
7843 if (is_ro())
7844 return; // nothing to do read-only vector already
7845 bvector<Alloc> bv_ro(*this, BM_READONLY);
7846 swap(bv_ro);
7847}
7848
7849//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7850
7851template<class Alloc>
7852void bvector<Alloc>::throw_bad_alloc()
7853{
7854#ifndef BM_NO_STL
7855 throw std::bad_alloc();
7856#else
7857 BM_THROW(BM_ERR_BADALLOC);
7858#endif
7859}
7860
7861//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7862//
7863//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7864
7865template<class Alloc>
7866bool bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::go_up() BMNOEXCEPT
7867{
7868 BM_ASSERT(this->valid());
7869
7870 block_descr_type* bdescr = &(this->bdescr_);
7871 if (this->block_type_) // GAP
7872 {
7873 BM_ASSERT(this->block_type_ == 1);
7874 ++this->position_;
7875 if (--(bdescr->gap_.gap_len))
7876 return true;
7877 // next gap is "OFF" by definition.
7878 if (*(bdescr->gap_.ptr) != bm::gap_max_bits - 1)
7879 {
7880 gap_word_t prev = *(bdescr->gap_.ptr);
7881 unsigned val = *(++(bdescr->gap_.ptr));
7882 this->position_ += val - prev;
7883 // next gap is now "ON"
7884 if (*(bdescr->gap_.ptr) != bm::gap_max_bits - 1)
7885 {
7886 prev = *(bdescr->gap_.ptr);
7887 val = *(++(bdescr->gap_.ptr));
7888 bdescr->gap_.gap_len = (gap_word_t)(val - prev);
7889 return true; // next "ON" found;
7890 }
7891 }
7892 }
7893 else // BIT
7894 {
7895 unsigned short idx = ++(bdescr->bit_.idx);
7896 if (idx < bdescr->bit_.cnt)
7897 {
7898 this->position_ = bdescr->bit_.pos + bdescr->bit_.bits[idx];
7899 return true;
7900 }
7901 this->position_ +=
7902 (bm::set_bitscan_wave_size * 32) - bdescr->bit_.bits[--idx];
7903 bdescr->bit_.ptr += bm::set_bitscan_wave_size;
7904 if (decode_bit_group(bdescr))
7905 return true;
7906 }
7907
7908 if (search_in_blocks())
7909 return true;
7910
7911 this->invalidate();
7912 return false;
7913}
7914
7915//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7916
7917
7918template<class Alloc>
7919bool bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::skip(size_type rank) BMNOEXCEPT
7920{
7921 if (!this->valid())
7922 return false;
7923 if (!rank)
7924 return this->valid(); // nothing to do
7925
7926 for (; rank; --rank)
7927 {
7928 block_descr_type* bdescr = &(this->bdescr_);
7929 switch (this->block_type_)
7930 {
7931 case 0: // BitBlock
7932 for (; rank; --rank)
7933 {
7934 unsigned short idx = ++(bdescr->bit_.idx);
7935 if (idx < bdescr->bit_.cnt)
7936 {
7937 this->position_ = bdescr->bit_.pos + bdescr->bit_.bits[idx];
7938 continue;
7939 }
7940 this->position_ +=
7941 (bm::set_bitscan_wave_size * 32) - bdescr->bit_.bits[--idx];
7942 bdescr->bit_.ptr += bm::set_bitscan_wave_size;
7943
7944 if (!decode_bit_group(bdescr, rank))
7945 break;
7946 } // for rank
7947 break;
7948 case 1: // DGAP Block
7949 for (; rank; --rank) // TODO: better skip logic
7950 {
7951 ++this->position_;
7952 if (--(bdescr->gap_.gap_len))
7953 continue;
7954
7955 // next gap is "OFF" by definition.
7956 if (*(bdescr->gap_.ptr) == bm::gap_max_bits - 1)
7957 break;
7958 gap_word_t prev = *(bdescr->gap_.ptr);
7959 unsigned int val = *(++(bdescr->gap_.ptr));
7960
7961 this->position_ += val - prev;
7962 // next gap is now "ON"
7963 if (*(bdescr->gap_.ptr) == bm::gap_max_bits - 1)
7964 break;
7965 prev = *(bdescr->gap_.ptr);
7966 val = *(++(bdescr->gap_.ptr));
7967 bdescr->gap_.gap_len = (gap_word_t)(val - prev);
7968 } // for rank
7969 break;
7970 default:
7971 BM_ASSERT(0);
7972 } // switch
7973
7974 if (!rank)
7975 return true;
7976
7977 if (!search_in_blocks())
7978 {
7979 this->invalidate();
7980 return false;
7981 }
7982 } // for rank
7983
7984 return this->valid();
7985}
7986
7987
7988//---------------------------------------------------------------------
7989
7990
7991template<class Alloc>
7992bool bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::go_to(size_type pos) BMNOEXCEPT
7993{
7994 if (pos == 0)
7995 {
7996 go_first();
7997 return this->valid();
7998 }
7999
8000 size_type new_pos = this->bv_->check_or_next(pos); // find the true pos
8001 if (!new_pos) // no bits available
8002 {
8003 this->invalidate();
8004 return false;
8005 }
8006 BM_ASSERT(new_pos >= pos);
8007 pos = new_pos;
8008
8009
8010 this->position_ = pos;
8011 size_type nb = this->block_idx_ = (pos >> bm::set_block_shift);
8012 bm::bvector<Alloc>::blocks_manager_type& bman =
8013 this->bv_->get_blocks_manager();
8014 unsigned i0, j0;
8015 bm::get_block_coord(nb, i0, j0);
8016 this->block_ = bman.get_block(i0, j0);
8017
8018 BM_ASSERT(this->block_);
8019
8020 this->block_type_ = (bool)BM_IS_GAP(this->block_);
8021
8022 block_descr_type* bdescr = &(this->bdescr_);
8023 unsigned nbit = unsigned(pos & bm::set_block_mask);
8024
8025 if (this->block_type_) // gap
8026 {
8027 this->position_ = nb * bm::set_block_size * 32;
8028 search_in_gapblock();
8029
8030 if (this->position_ == pos)
8031 return this->valid();
8032 this->position_ = pos;
8033
8034 gap_word_t* gptr = BMGAP_PTR(this->block_);
8035 unsigned is_set;
8036 unsigned gpos = bm::gap_bfind(gptr, nbit, &is_set);
8037 BM_ASSERT(is_set);
8038
8039 bdescr->gap_.ptr = gptr + gpos;
8040 if (gpos == 1)
8041 {
8042 bdescr->gap_.gap_len = bm::gap_word_t(gptr[gpos] - (nbit - 1));
8043 }
8044 else
8045 {
8046 bm::gap_word_t interval = bm::gap_word_t(gptr[gpos] - gptr[gpos - 1]);
8047 bm::gap_word_t interval2 = bm::gap_word_t(nbit - gptr[gpos - 1]);
8048 bdescr->gap_.gap_len = bm::gap_word_t(interval - interval2 + 1);
8049 }
8050 }
8051 else // bit
8052 {
8053 if (nbit == 0)
8054 {
8055 search_in_bitblock();
8056 return this->valid();
8057 }
8058
8059 unsigned nword = unsigned(nbit >> bm::set_word_shift);
8060
8061 // check if we need to step back to match the wave
8062 unsigned parity = nword % bm::set_bitscan_wave_size;
8063 bdescr->bit_.ptr = this->block_ + (nword - parity);
8064 bdescr->bit_.cnt = bm::bitscan_wave(bdescr->bit_.ptr, bdescr->bit_.bits);
8065 BM_ASSERT(bdescr->bit_.cnt);
8066 bdescr->bit_.pos = (nb * bm::set_block_size * 32) + ((nword - parity) * 32);
8067 bdescr->bit_.idx = 0;
8068 nbit &= bm::set_word_mask;
8069 nbit += 32 * parity;
8070 for (unsigned i = 0; i < bdescr->bit_.cnt; ++i)
8071 {
8072 if (bdescr->bit_.bits[i] == nbit)
8073 return this->valid();
8074 bdescr->bit_.idx++;
8075 } // for
8076 BM_ASSERT(0);
8077 }
8078 return this->valid();
8079}
8080
8081//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8082
8083template<class Alloc>
8084void bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::go_first() BMNOEXCEPT
8085{
8086 BM_ASSERT(this->bv_);
8087
8088 blocks_manager_type* bman = &(this->bv_->blockman_);
8089 if (!bman->is_init())
8090 {
8091 this->invalidate();
8092 return;
8093 }
8094
8095 bm::word_t*** blk_root = bman->top_blocks_root();
8096 this->block_idx_ = this->position_= 0;
8097 unsigned i, j;
8098
8099 for (i = 0; i < bman->top_block_size(); ++i)
8100 {
8101 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
8102 if (blk_blk == 0) // not allocated
8103 {
8104 this->block_idx_ += bm::set_sub_array_size;
8105 this->position_ += bm::bits_in_array;
8106 continue;
8107 }
8108
8109 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
8110 blk_blk = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
8111
8112 for (j = 0; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j,++(this->block_idx_))
8113 {
8114 this->block_ = blk_blk[j];
8115 if (this->block_ == 0)
8116 {
8117 this->position_ += bits_in_block;
8118 continue;
8119 }
8120 if (BM_IS_GAP(this->block_))
8121 {
8122 this->block_type_ = 1;
8123 if (search_in_gapblock())
8124 return;
8125 }
8126 else
8127 {
8128 if (this->block_ == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
8129 this->block_ = FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
8130 this->block_type_ = 0;
8131 if (search_in_bitblock())
8132 return;
8133 }
8134 } // for j
8135 } // for i
8136
8137 this->invalidate();
8138}
8139
8140//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8141
8142template<class Alloc>
8143bool
8144bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::decode_wave(block_descr_type* bdescr) BMNOEXCEPT
8145{
8146 bdescr->bit_.cnt = bm::bitscan_wave(bdescr->bit_.ptr, bdescr->bit_.bits);
8147 if (bdescr->bit_.cnt) // found
8148 {
8149 bdescr->bit_.idx = 0;
8150 return true;
8151 }
8152 return false;
8153}
8154
8155//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8156
8157template<class Alloc>
8158bool
8159bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::decode_bit_group(block_descr_type* bdescr) BMNOEXCEPT
8160{
8161 const word_t* block_end = this->block_ + bm::set_block_size;
8162 for (; bdescr->bit_.ptr < block_end;)
8163 {
8164 if (decode_wave(bdescr))
8165 {
8166 bdescr->bit_.pos = this->position_;
8167 this->position_ += bdescr->bit_.bits[0];
8168 return true;
8169 }
8170 this->position_ += bm::set_bitscan_wave_size * 32; // wave size
8171 bdescr->bit_.ptr += bm::set_bitscan_wave_size;
8172 } // for
8173 return false;
8174}
8175
8176//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8177
8178template<class Alloc>
8179bool
8180bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::decode_bit_group(block_descr_type* bdescr,
8181 size_type& rank) BMNOEXCEPT
8182{
8183 const word_t* BMRESTRICT block_end = this->block_ + bm::set_block_size;
8184 for (; bdescr->bit_.ptr < block_end;)
8185 {
8186 unsigned cnt;
8187 #if defined(BMAVX512OPT) || defined(BMAVX2OPT) || defined(BM64OPT) || defined(BM64_SSE4)
8188 {
8189 const bm::id64_t* w64_p = (bm::id64_t*)bdescr->bit_.ptr;
8190 BM_ASSERT(bm::set_bitscan_wave_size == 4);
8191 cnt = bm::word_bitcount64(w64_p[0]);
8192 cnt += bm::word_bitcount64(w64_p[1]);
8193 }
8194 #else
8195 const bm::word_t* BMRESTRICT w = bdescr->bit_.ptr;
8196 unsigned c1= bm::word_bitcount(w[0]);
8197 unsigned c2 = bm::word_bitcount(w[1]);
8198 cnt = c1 + c2;
8199 c1= bm::word_bitcount(w[2]);
8200 c2 = bm::word_bitcount(w[3]);
8201 cnt += c1 + c2;
8202 #endif
8203
8204 if (rank > cnt)
8205 {
8206 rank -= cnt;
8207 }
8208 else
8209 {
8210 if (decode_wave(bdescr))
8211 {
8212 bdescr->bit_.pos = this->position_;
8213 this->position_ += bdescr->bit_.bits[0];
8214 return true;
8215 }
8216 }
8217 this->position_ += bm::set_bitscan_wave_size * 32; // wave size
8218 bdescr->bit_.ptr += bm::set_bitscan_wave_size;
8219 } // for
8220 return false;
8221}
8222
8223
8224//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8225
8226template<class Alloc>
8227bool bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::search_in_bitblock() BMNOEXCEPT
8228{
8229 BM_ASSERT(this->block_type_ == 0);
8230
8231 block_descr_type* bdescr = &(this->bdescr_);
8232 bdescr->bit_.ptr = this->block_;
8233 return decode_bit_group(bdescr);
8234}
8235
8236//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8237
8238template<class Alloc>
8239bool bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::search_in_gapblock() BMNOEXCEPT
8240{
8241 BM_ASSERT(this->block_type_ == 1);
8242
8243 block_descr_type* bdescr = &(this->bdescr_);
8244 bdescr->gap_.ptr = BMGAP_PTR(this->block_);
8245 unsigned bitval = *(bdescr->gap_.ptr) & 1;
8246
8247 ++(bdescr->gap_.ptr);
8248
8249 for (;true;)
8250 {
8251 unsigned val = *(bdescr->gap_.ptr);
8252 if (bitval)
8253 {
8254 gap_word_t* first = BMGAP_PTR(this->block_) + 1;
8255 if (bdescr->gap_.ptr == first)
8256 {
8257 bdescr->gap_.gap_len = (gap_word_t)(val + 1);
8258 }
8259 else
8260 {
8261 bdescr->gap_.gap_len =
8262 (gap_word_t)(val - *(bdescr->gap_.ptr-1));
8263 }
8264 return true;
8265 }
8266 this->position_ += val + 1;
8267 if (val == bm::gap_max_bits - 1)
8268 break;
8269 bitval ^= 1;
8270 ++(bdescr->gap_.ptr);
8271 }
8272 return false;
8273}
8274
8275//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8276
8277template<class Alloc>
8278bool bvector<Alloc>::enumerator::search_in_blocks() BMNOEXCEPT
8279{
8280 ++(this->block_idx_);
8281 const blocks_manager_type& bman = this->bv_->blockman_;
8282 block_idx_type i = this->block_idx_ >> bm::set_array_shift;
8283 block_idx_type top_block_size = bman.top_block_size();
8284 bm::word_t*** blk_root = bman.top_blocks_root();
8285 for (; i < top_block_size; ++i)
8286 {
8287 bm::word_t** blk_blk = blk_root[i];
8288 if (blk_blk == 0)
8289 {
8290 // fast scan fwd in top level
8291 size_type bn = this->block_idx_ + bm::set_sub_array_size;
8292 size_type pos = this->position_ + bm::bits_in_array;
8293 for (++i; i < top_block_size; ++i)
8294 {
8295 if (blk_root[i])
8296 break;
8297 bn += bm::set_sub_array_size;
8298 pos += bm::bits_in_array;
8299 } // for i
8300 this->block_idx_ = bn;
8301 this->position_ = pos;
8302 if ((i < top_block_size) && blk_root[i])
8303 --i;
8304 continue;
8305 }
8306 if ((bm::word_t*)blk_blk == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
8307 blk_blk = FULL_SUB_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
8308
8309 block_idx_type j = this->block_idx_ & bm::set_array_mask;
8310
8311 for(; j < bm::set_sub_array_size; ++j, ++(this->block_idx_))
8312 {
8313 this->block_ = blk_blk[j];
8314 if (this->block_ == 0)
8315 {
8316 this->position_ += bm::bits_in_block;
8317 continue;
8318 }
8319 this->block_type_ = BM_IS_GAP(this->block_);
8320 if (this->block_type_)
8321 {
8322 if (search_in_gapblock())
8323 return true;
8324 }
8325 else
8326 {
8327 if (this->block_ == FULL_BLOCK_FAKE_ADDR)
8328 this->block_ = FULL_BLOCK_REAL_ADDR;
8329 if (search_in_bitblock())
8330 return true;
8331 }
8332 } // for j
8333 } // for i
8334 return false;
8335}
8336
8337//---------------------------------------------------------------------
8338
8339
8340} // namespace
8341
8342
8343#ifdef _MSC_VER
8344#pragma warning( pop )
8345#endif
8346
8347
8348#endif
BM_BORDER_TEST
#define BM_BORDER_TEST(blk, idx)
Definition: bm.h:2647

#define BM_SUB_OP(x)

#define BM_XOR_OP(x)

#define BM_AND_OP(x)

#define BM_OR_OP(x)

#define BM_DECLARE_TEMP_BLOCK(x)

#define VECT_XOR_ARR_2_MASK(dst, src, src_end, mask)

bmdef.h

IS_FULL_BLOCK
#define IS_FULL_BLOCK(addr)
Definition: bmdef.h:162
IS_VALID_ADDR
#define IS_VALID_ADDR(addr)
